"City-Sized me" said May in a dreamy voice. "looks like I'm almost city-sized now"

"So....uhh..." said Brock. "what now?"

"I have a few ideas..." said May and then something happened to her eyes for just an instant; her blue eyes had an ethereal glow around them. The glow came and went in a heartbeat. For that instant, Ash had the uncontrollable urge to offer food for May.

"Such as?" asked Brock with just a twinge of fear in his voice.

"I feel like a queen looming over you all like this" said May. "so why not I rule this city as one?"

"...What?" asked Ash.

"I'm large and in charge" said May. "I'm the biggest one here so I should be the one in charge"

Before Ash, Brock and Max could say anything, a new voice came.

"Who says you're the biggest one around here?" asked a new voice. May turned around to see who had spoken.
12311112111.title: Queen May?

choices: May wins by swallowing Drew, growing and then undegoing a metamorphosis.
Drew proves tougher than expected and May has to grow more to gain the edge.
123111121111.content:
May's eyes narrowed as soon as she heard the source of the deep voice that had interrupted her-- it was none other than Drew, her most persistent and infuriating rival in the field of Pokémon Contests. Except it was... well, a lot more of him than she remembered! Evidently, Drew had gotten hold of some Rare Candies as well, along with copious amounts of food afterward-- he too had ballooned into a massive blubber titan, standing more than a head taller than May and packing on even more tonnage than her. He was totally naked, of course, and sported a huge multi-rolled gut that hung well past his waist and dragged again the ground, as well as great, floppy moobs that could give May's chest a run for its money, and a round, chubby face with numerous chins that was currently displaying an arrogant smirk.

"I don't see you becoming Queen of anything, at least not as long as I'm around!" he boomed smugly, stomping toward May and sending his fat jiggling wildly. The slightly-smaller Coordinator fumed at the sight of her rival outdoing her again, even as she blushed a little from seeing him so huge and so... exposed. Nevertheless, her newfound domination instinct reigned supreme, and from the ground Ash could see her eyes once again light up with that otherworldly blue glow.

"Is that so?" she said defiantly, waddling up to Drew without a hint of fear. "How about I prove who's worthy to rule these tiny people-- by beating you?" He laughed deeply in response, seemingly assured of his victory.

"You're on! So, how do you want to do this, I'm sure I'll win anyway-- oof!" May wasted no time in tackling Drew while he was talking, slamming her heavy body against his like a powerful sumo wrestler. She pushed her bulk forward, putting the powerful muscles that resided beneath her thick blubber to good use and grabbing onto the larger boy's ample love handles for leverage. Drew was caught off guard, but soon recovered, pushing back with his own strength and sending May sprawling with a palm strike. Her fat wildly bounced and jiggled, but May herself stayed on her feet, before charging again. As their skyscraper-sized bodies clashed together, both fatty giants soon began to sweat profusely, their rolls becoming shiny and wet, and causing their grips on one another to slip briefly. All the while, their fat feet and swinging bellies smashed and crushed any remaining buildings around the two, and Ash, Brock, and Max could only watch as the two titans devastated the city in their battle for supremacy.
123111121111.title: End of a rivalry?

choices: May looks over her new self and likes it
May's change isn't over yet!
1231111211111.content:
For several minutes, it looked like Drew was going to come out the winner. The two titans of flab pushed against each other, delivering punches and kicks. Ash, Brock and Max had to vacate the area to avoid being crushed by either of the two battling giants.
The tide turned in May's favor as she managed to deliver a hard punch right in Drew's face and causing him to fall to the ground. It looked as though May had knocked her rival out cold. May breathed heavily to catch her breath. "You know, Drew....all this fighting is making me hungry" said May, rubbing her big belly. "If I want to rule this town...and it looks like there isn't much left thanks to our fighting...I'd have to eat you"
"She's gonna eat Drew?!" asked Max. "but Drew is far too large for May to do that!"
"You can't eat me" said Drew and attempted to get back up to his feet. But May charged at Drew before he could regain his footing and Drew ended up under May. May licked her lips and opened her mouth wide--far more wider than any human could have and engulfed Drew's head in her mouth. Drew tried to fight off May but it was no use. May gulped, sending Drew's head down her throat and his shoulders entered her mouth. May wasn't much interested in tasting her large meal as she swallowed again and Drew's huge chest entered her mouth. She then decided to lick Drew's chest. "You taste good" said May, her voice muffled.
Ash, Brock and Max could only stare agape at what May was doing.
"But how can that be possible?!" asked Max.
"I have no idea" said Brock.
"Look at her eat...." said Ash in a faraway voice. If someone was paying attention they might've spotted Ash was sporting a tent in his pants but nobody saw it. They were too focused on May as she devoured her rival.
It took several minutes for May to eat Drew. With a final mighty gulp, Drew's legs vanished into May's mouth.
"That hits the spot" said May, rubbing her bigger belly.
That's when May noticed something coming out of her back....and that wasn't all. Within moments of finishing off her meal, May seemed to be going through some sort of metamorphosis. She started to grow dragon-like scales all over her body as two small wings emerged from her back and a tail was starting to grow from the base of her back. She was also gaining size, both in weight and muscle.
"What's...happening to me?!" asked May. That's when May's face began to change too.
"She's turning into a dragon!" shouted Ash.
"By eating Drew?" asked Max.
"You got me" said Ash.
Indeed, it looked as though May was turning into a dragon. Her scales were dark green in color, lighter green on her underside. It was evident that May was in great pain as she was wincing and shouting.
The transformation took about fifteen minutes, although it seemed far longer. When it was over with, May had completely changed from a human giant and into a honest-to-goodness dragon! For several minutes after the transformation May just laid there on the ground.
"Is she sleeping?" asked Max.
"I don't think so" said Ash. "she's just resting"
1231111211111.title: May the Dragon

choices: The heads stop arguing and try to focus on consolidating their power.
Ash and Brock try to sneak away.
12311112111112.content:
Sure enough, May soon began to stir again, before slowly pulling herself up from the ground. Ash and Max watched her closely, hoping that the newly-transformed dragon girl wouldn't suddenly go on aggressive rampage or something like that. As she opened her slitted blue eyes, her dragon snout wrinkled into an uncomfortable expression and she held her head in her hands. "Ohh..." she moaned, swaying back and forth clumsily on her clawed feet. "I have such a headache right now..." Before she could say anything else, May let out a gasp as her body once again seized up-- she could feel the waves of transformation flowing through her again, but this time they remained in her head and neck area. Her neck grew much longer, and a series of small, fleshy nubs started to grow next to it. "Wh-whoa...what's happening now? What are these things?!"

The nubs suddenly burst forth and grew into 2 new, equally long necks, complete with their own fanged and horned dragon heads at the ends! May's original head seemed to go into a trance afterward, staring blankly as another two heads surged out of her shoulders. Each had a slightly different shade of green to its scales, but their faces were identical to May's "normal" one, and even still sported her trademark hairstyle. However, a fifth one that grew in next to her central head looked quite different-- it was purple instead of green, save for a rather familiar-looking mop of green hair on top it, with its horns growing through it. Once all of the new dragon heads had grown in, May's entire body once again grew a few more feet, before suddenly petering out. All five heads hung limply from her shoulders, but now they were beginning to stir, staring with the "original".

"What... what happened? Where am I?" she asked in a soft voice, craning her long neck to look around and spotting Max watching from below. "Oh my! It's not safe for you here, dear little brother! Here, let big sister help you..." She reached one huge, flabby, clawed arm down and picked up Max, who had quite honestly given up on figuring out just what was going on with his sister.

"Hey, what are you doing?!" he cried, struggling as May-- or at least one fifth of her-- scooped him up and cuddled him against her giant, scaly, yet soft breasts. "What the heck happened to you? Why are-- mmmph!-- you so freaking affectionate all of a sudden?!" Before he could get an answer, though, the rightmost head woke up, its eyes glowing an angry blue and a nasty look on its face.

"Hey, who do you think you are, inviting my-- uh, our-- stupid little brother?" she asked grumpily, taking control of the opposite arm and trying to grab Max. The nice, almost motherly first head pulled him away, pouting. "He doesn't deserve this attention, he should be bowing to us like all the other pathetic, tiny humans!" As the two fought over their brother, two more heads awakened, each offering their own piece.

"Stop arguing, you two! I swear, you're acting like children..."

"Uggghhh...forget all this stupid crap, I need FOOD right now! Food, food, FOOOOOOD~!"

The four May heads bickered back and forth, before the final one woke up, gasping in horror upon realizing where it-- or rather, HE-- was. "What the... all I remember is getting swallowed by... oh no. No, no, no, this can't be happening!" Drew's dragon neck stretched away from the other four as he shrieked madly, trying to pull himself away, but to no avail.

Meanwhile, Ash and Brock watched the spectacle from below with vaguely bemused looks on their faces.

"I... don't even, anymore," Brock remarked, to which Ash just nodded dumbly.
12311112111112.title: Multiple Head Case

choices: Ash and Brock try to sneak away
May decides what to do next
123111121111121.content:
"Can we eat something? I'm starving here!"

"But you--err, we--just ate a whole restaurant. You couldn't possibly be hungry!"

"Mustn't eat too much. You---err, we--will get fa--"

"ALL OF YOU SHUT UP!!!!"


The last shout came from May's "original" head and it was so loud that several windows in the town shattered. The shout echoed for miles around and it was followed by an inhuman roaring. The other heads stopped arguing and looked to the "original" head. Drew was trying to get as far away from the other heads as he could get. There was a beat of an eerie silence. Ash and Brock had to covered their ears from the shout. Max was still cradled next to May's heaving breast.

"Now we should work out a system here" said May's original head. "we just can't keep arguing with ourselves or nothing will get done!"

"Who made you boss?" asked the nasty head with a sneer.

"Well, seeing that I was the original head here" said May. "I say that makes me in charge"

"A sensible thought, dearie" said the motherly head.

"I don't care who's in charge" said the hungry head. "as long as we eat something"

"Can't you think about anything besides food?" snapped the nasty one.

"Now, now" said the matronly head. "let's not start arguing again" She glanced over to Drew, "Why is he here?"

"That's what I wanna know" said Drew. "I don't want to be a part of you all"

"Why don't we cut him off then?" asked the nasty head.

"Or let me eat him" chimed the hungry head.

The mean head looked at the hungry head. "You seriously want to eat one of our heads?!"

"I say we let him stay" said the motherly head.

"Be quiet!" snapped May's original head. "for the moment, he's staying. Besides if we do cut his head off wouldn't two more heads grow in his place?"

"Why on earth would that happen?" asked the hungry head.

"Well, we are a hydra now" said May. "and the legend about the hydra is that if you cut off one of its heads, two more heads will take its place"

"Having one head is enough for me" said Drew.

"Okay, okay" said the original head. "enough idle talk. I want to talk about something serious right here, right now"

"And what would that be?" asked the motherly head.

"About what to do now" said the original head.

"What are you talking about?" snorted the mean head. "it's pretty clear to me what we should do now; take over the world and rule all the puny little humans as gods! Look at us! We're a giant hydra, nothing will probably hurt us because of our scales!!"

"Ruling the world isn't going to be easy with the five of us bickering" said the motherly head. "we all should agree to co-exist peacefully with each other before even thinking about ruling the world"

"I hate to admit it" said the mean one, "but she does have a point there. Nothing will get accomplished if we all keep bickering with each other. So..truce?"
"....truce" said all of the heads, including Drew,
123111121111121.title: Stop that bickering!

choices: May arrives in Slateport City without opposition.
Team Rocket tries to stop May on the way.
1231111211111212.content:
"Alright then, so it's settled," said May's original head, as the others all nodded in approval. "Good! So now that we're all in agreement on that, I think it's time to decide on our next move... namely, food!" Her huge, scaly belly let out a monstrous rumble just as she finished her sentence, and the hungry head roared in anticipation at the mention of food.

"Now THAT'S what I'm talking about!" she growled, her forked tongue hanging out of her mouth as she drooled. "Food, food, food, FOOD!! What do we eat first? There's nothing left in this puny city, we need something nooowwww....!" The motherly head, on the other hand, shook disappointedly.

"Now, now, no need to get ahead of yourself, dearie-- eat too much, and you'll get fat! We mustn't have that-- a healthy hydra is a happy hydra!"

"Uh, I don't know if you've noticed," the nasty head chimed in, "But WE'RE ALREADY FUCKING FAT! Do you not SEE all of this?!" Taking control of the hydra's thick, muscular arms, she grabbed two clawfuls of thick, jiggly belly blubber and squeezed, making the other heads moan a bit at the feeling. "mmm...s-so there's no point in complaining! Let's just get as fat as possible-- bigger is ALWAYS better!" All the while, Drew's head just sort of hung low in despair... he couldn't deny that he was hungry too, but the idea of being stuck with May and... uh, the other Mays for the foreseeable future was bumming him out.

"Alright, so we agree that we need food!" May's original head shouted over the others. "Let's head to Rustboro City-- it's huge there'll be a lot of food for us to eat there!" The others all nodded and agreed, save for Drew, and the hydra began to stop along toward the next city... albeit very clumsily, as 5 heads controlling two legs was a recipe for disaster. At the same time, Ash and the others were still stuck in May-and-company's cleavage... by now, even Ash was beginning to like it, as if the hydra had some kind of compelling aura or pheromones that attracted others to her, but he and his friends still recognized what needed to be done.

"I guess we're kinda stuck here for now... but we gotta try and think of something to stop May!" Ash said, looking to Max and Brock, who were pressed up against them in the cavernous space between May's huge dragon boobs.

"Easy for you to say!" replied Max, annoyed. "What are we gonna do, have Pikachu shock her? She's way too big, plus she's probably Dragon-type now, so it wouldn't be very effective anyway..."

"Hey, maybe someone in the next city can help us!" The others looked at Brock as he spoke. "If we can get as far as Slateport, at least May will be facing the sea and won't be able to cause QUITE as much damage..."
1231111211111212.title: May, myself, and I

choices: The hungry head eats Team Rocket
One of the heads stops her
12311112111112122.content:
"Hey..." said May's original head. "why don't we just fly to Slateport? We have wings, right? Let's use them"

"I'm not sure that is a good idea" said Drew. "we're barely getting along just by walking as it is. If we fly, we will probably get lost"

"Like that hasn't happened before" said the nasty head. "honestly, Ash has no sense of direction!"

By this time, May had stomped her way out of the puny city she had ruined. The hydra walked more or less straight. Clearly having five heads controlling one body was going to take some time. All the while the hungry head started to hum a tune about eating and eating forever.

"Will you shut up about food?!" asked the nasty head.

"I can't help it" said the hungry head.

"How far is Slateport City anyway?" asked the motherly head.

Before any of the heads could reply, a familiar-looking trio sprang into view from a bush. It was none other then Jessie, James and Meowth of Team Rokcet.

"Prepare for trouble!" said Jessie.

"and make it......AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!"

James stopped the motto when he saw the gigantic hydra monster in front of him. All three Rocket members all screamed.

"How did the twerp get so big?!" asked Jessie.

"Can I eat them?" asked the hungry head. "pleasepleaseplease?!?!"

"And have all three of them as heads?" asked the nasty head.

"Doesn't sound that appealing to me" snorted Drew. "nothing but empty calories"

"I don't care about calories!" shouted the hungry head. "All I care about is FOOD!" The hungry head gained control of one arm and snatched up the three slacked-jaw Rocket members. The hungry head opened her mouth as the arm was bringing the arm ever closer.
12311112111112122.title: Worse timing ever

choices: May and her heads arrive in town and begin to devour the city.
Team Rocket awakens to find themselves alive in May's belly.
123111121111121221.content:
"No, no, dearie, put them down!" May's motherly head objected as the hungry head brought Team Rocket closer and closer to her gaping maw. "What would our mother say if she saw you trying to eat living beings? Such naughty, naughty behavior..."

The other dragon head was less than convinced, though. She rolled her eyes, replying, "Oh, please... you have the same memories as me, don't you? All these jerks ever did was annoy the crap out of us and try to steal Ash's stupid Pikachu all the time! Trust me, I'm doing us a favor by eating them... though mostly me-- I'm STARVING, and I'm not about to let you stop me!" Wasting no more time, she threw the screaming Rockets into her mouth, swallowing them with a loud "gulp" that sent them down her throat as a visible lump that traveled to their shared stomach. "mmm... not the most filling snack, but definitely tasty, hehe."

"This is insane..." Drew's head hung off to the right side, lamenting how his situation only seemed to grow more bizarre by the second... still, he did at least like that he was a bit less hungry after their snack.

"Okay, so that's out of the way at least," May's original head piped in, getting the attention of her "sisters" on both sides. "But it's like Ms. Hungry over there said, that was WAY too little to fill our stomach!" She patted at their round, fat belly to make her point, causing it to jiggle a bit. It remained soft and yielding to the touch, a tell-tale sign that it was still largely empty. A loud, rumbling growl emitted from within, sounding not too dissimilar to the angry head as she growled in annoyance.

"Oh, yeah, thanks for telling us the obvious!" she snapped, stretching past the hungry head to address May Prime in the centre. "I'm tired of Fatty here next to me complaining about food, and I'd like a meal myself, hopefully some time before the Heat Death of the fucking Universe! Let's just get on to Slateport already!" They were about to move when the matronly head took control of their legs and made them stop. Well, more like made them stumble, almost causing the whole hydra to topple over. "Ugh, what the hell is it now? Who's not letting us walk?!"

"Well, I just had a bit of a concern," said the head just to May's right. "I swear, did any of you children stop to think about what eating those three would do to us? I mean, look at Drew! The poor dear ended up a part of us after we ate him, aren't you worried it'll happen again?" A long pause went by as all five heads pondered over the question. Eventually, May herself spoke, looking thoughtfully down at her belly.

"Well...I don't feel anything. Nothing happening, nothing building up. Maybe Drew was a fluke?" The other four heads all turned to face him, as if expecting an answer.

"What? How am I supposed to know how this ridiculous body works? Wait, unless..." Placing their right claw on his chin in thought, he scoured his mind for ideas. "Maybe... maybe I only ended up as a head on our body because I was already inside May when she transformed?" The others all sounded off in agreement.

"Makes about as much sense as anything else that's happened so far," May Prime replied. "Okay, but enough speculating-- we've got a city to find! And probably eat..." The hydra tried flapping its wings, hoping to close the gap of the trip with some flight, but it was a no-go-- their wings were too tiny to heft such a huge, blubber body into the air. So, they simply continued to walk, struggling to maintain balance but largely succeeding, and the city was soon in sight thanks to their massive strides.
123111121111121221.title: An appetiser for the meals to come

choices: May moves on to the next city
The city's trainers fight back!
All that food begins to have an affect on May
1231111211111212211.content:
Wading through a sea of rustling leaves and branches, giant legs with long strides gave the giant hydra an easy time closing the distance to the city. Even with her vision partially obscured by her humongous titflesh, the multi-headed monster that was May took pleasure in feeling her expansive, creamy middle jiggle with each heavy step she took. It felt good to be this big, to be so powerful. A trip that would have taken days took only a few minutes as she crushed and stomped her way forward, and the loud rumbling sounds that her belly emitted made her quicken her pace towards her destination as her thick and sinewy tail dragged a trench into the ground in their wake.

“Is that the city I see in the distance?” the motherly head asked once the human settlement was in sight, prompting May prime to nod her head and lick her lips in response, her nostrils flaring as she took in all the delicious scents the bustling city had to offer. "Yep, that's Slateport city. Mmmn... I hope you girls all like seafood."

The thought of all the filling treats available to the hydra prompted another loud gurgle from their shared belly, and with their hands sliding down to rub at their pliant middle in response, the greedy head roared out her impatience. "By now I'll eat anything! What are you all waiting for? Let's go!" Taking control of their legs, she marched the bulky hydra forward.

The citizens of Slateport weren’t ready. May arrived with little subtlety, and the tremors her heavy stomps made could be felt far before she was even visible to those on the street. By now rumours had spread that a new giant, multi-headed pokemon was devouring everything in its wake, but as the 150 foot, stacked hydra emerged from the foliage surrounding the North side of the city, the response was still met with utter shock.

May's Alpha head's fan-like ears twitched to the pleasant sound of human screams and yelps as she rested her hands on her wide hips and snickered at the reaction the people were having to their appearance. She had, after all, a very promiscuous-looking symbol of attractiveness; and her growth had only added to that gorgeous figure, with their incredible metabolism not only expanding their belly but also amplifying their curvaceous figure with smooth, pliable layer of pudge being deposited in all the right places on their scaly body with every meal they had.

May Prime couldn't help but smile as well at the reaction from her observers and stepped forwards into the city's streets, sending them all running away in fear as her clawed feet stomped into the ground and cracking it under her weight. Although not out to destroy the city, she found it difficult to avoid slamming her wide hips into the sides of buildings as she stepped between them, and her tail caused mayhem of its own as its powerful length carved through streets and small buildings behind her.

Nevertheless, the huge hydra disregarded any destruction she may have cause and continued to travel down to Slateport's coastline where the city's market was located, each head letting out a low purr as the scents of all the fresh seafood and other edible goods on offer made their presence below them. Wasting no time, May scooped the stalls by pairs off the ground, unintentionally shaking her giant, plush ass at any observers behind her when she had to bend over, as well as giving them a more than generous view of her prominent heated folds.

“One for me...” May mentioned as she rose one of the stalls to her maw and shook its contents into her mouth, "And one for one of you..." she added before tossing the other stall into the air above her, causing the hydra's 'female' heads to stretch out and snap into the air in an attempt to snatch up the descending stall before any of their neighbors could.

Despite each head trying their hardest to grab the stall out of the air with their teeth; using her more prominent horns, it was the hydra's Alpha head that won the competition by butting the greedy head out of the way of the stall just as it was about to land in her open maw.

"H-hey, that was mine!" She exclaimed in response, pouting as she watched the stall's contents bulge down the Alpha head's throat and a low purr emit from her maw.

"Should of fought for it then, lardass." Came the response from the meaner head as she tossed the emptied stall to the ground. "Mmmn, it was delicious though, Bet you wish you got it."

"Why you-!"

"Both of you stop fighting at once!" The motherly head interrupted. "None of us will get anywhere arguing with each other. Apologize to her and move on."

"You CAN'T be serious. If you think I'm going to-"

The interaction was cut short however when May prime tossed up another stall, and the battle stared again. This system continued on for a few minutes as each head got their fill of food. However the supply of fresh seafood and other treats only lasted for a short period, and the hydra that was May was forced to move onto the pokemon specific items available in the market - showing no hesitance towards continue feasting on poffins, pokeblocks, vitamins and other treats. Eventually May finished off every single stall in the market, and each head smacked their lips in satisfaction of the meal. Food intended to be eaten by over a thousand people and pokemon over the durations of at least a week was completely devoured by a single creature in the space of 15 minutes. With the immense mass of food products beginning to build up in her belly, May's arms rubbed at their swollen middle, mulling curiously over how her belly was able to stretch so much. However, the loud grumble it let out upon her touch only proved that the Hydra was still hungry.
1231111211111212211.title: Market Fresh Food

choices: The hunt begins
Legendaries begin to arrive to fight May
May begins to transform further from the pokemon she had eaten.
12311112111112122112.content:
Contemplating where to go for her next meal, May had to stop when she suddenly felt something tickle against her legs. Her brow arcing, May prime looked down past her wobbling masses of mammary flesh and her expansive creamy middle to see an assortment of trainers and their pokemon below attacking the scales of her lower body.

“Attack the monster!" May picked up from their shouting. "We have to stop it from destroying the city!"

"Ah, I’m sorry! I didn't mean to break anything. I'm just so hungry!” she responded, waving her giant claws defensively while making sure one had its fingers clamped firmly around the maw of her Alpha head, who looked quite eager to say a few words to the trainers attacking them. "I can’t help what happened... Ow! Hey, stop that!" she added when an Arcanine bit down on the flesh of one of her toes.

"Don't listen to it! Keep attacking the monster!" Soon flying types began attacking her from a more advantageous position, their shots hitting her in the neck, breasts and face as she attempted to gently swat at the air around her in an attempt to deter them from attacking. “I’m serious; I don't want to hurt anyone. I just need something to eat!"

"Get the fat monster! Whoever catches it will own the biggest pokemon bitch in history!"

That was it. May was not about to have anyone insult her like that - especially from something comparatively as large as a bug compared to her. "If you’re going to keep calling me a monster..." she growled darkly, her eyes glaring down at the diminutive bunch of trainers and their pokemon. Gone was the tolerant and meek trainer she once was; she was a hydra now, big and as hungry they came. They thought she was a monster; she was going to show them how much of a monster she could be.

With her patience gone, the unbridled force of nature that was the giant red hydra descended upon the crowd with surprising speed, kneeling on one of her legs while her claw swiped across the street to snatch up a handful of trainers and their pokemon. Bringing them up to her maw, each of her heads gathered close to glare at the collection of diminutive beings in her grasp as her hot breath washed over them. “You pathetic little bugs think I’m a monster do you? Well, this monster is hungry and you are all starting to look like a nice snack.”

There was something particularly taboo about eating a pokemon due to the amount of intelligence they possessed. Then again, it wasn't exactly ethically acceptable either to eat a fellow human being. However, the thought simply made the edges of the Hydra's many lips curl into a slightly cruel smirk. But she wasn't human anymore, now was she? She wasn't even a pokemon. She was simply a species of her own now - a 150 foot dragon giantess, an apex predator with no equal comparable to her immense strength and size, the new ruler of this world. And she was hungry.

Looking down at the dozen or so little beings in her soft scaly palm with a new ravenous light shining in her eyes, May prime could feel her mouth wetten in anticipation as a rather prominent growl emanated from the combined dragoness' sizable middle, providing an audible cue for those she was holding that any rational judgement she may have still possessed was clouded in favour of her insatiable belly. Wasting no more time, she licked her lips with her long flexible tongue and slurped the wet organ across the palm of her hand, scooping up her captives onto its warm surface in the process as she tilted her head back and let the trainers and their teams slide down into her awaiting gullet.

"Oh my God! I-I never knew pokemon tasted that good!" She chirped in surprise, before quickly letting her tongue slide over her chops to lick up the rest of her treat's delectable taste. "And those humans didn't taste that bad either, hehe..."

The other heads nodded in agreement, except for Drew who was noticeably flustered by May prime's actions. "What are you doing!" he exclaimed in dismay, wrapping his head around to look at May's central head. " We - I mean you, can't just eat innocent people!"

"Says who?" May prime responded casually, picking up and tossing another group of pokemon and their trainers into her open maw. "We’re a monster aren’t we? It's not like anyone can stop us. If we're hungry, we should just take what we want."

"Fuck yeah" came a roar of agreement from May's Alpha head. "These bugs have to learn that they're nothing but a snack for us now." Taking control of one of their powerful arms, she scooped up a large collection fleeing bystanders and promptly swallowing a mouthful of them, a claw descending down her middle to rub at her plush belly as the other heads watched a distinct bulge travel down the hydra's throat while she purred her enjoyment of the treat.

"H-Hey! Save some for me, I'm hungry too!" Came a cry from the greedy head as she dipped her maw towards the Alpha head's collected stash. Her neighboring head was too quick however, and managed to pull their hand away before she could attempt to swipe a mouthful of them for herself.

"We're all hungry, lard-ass" The Alpha head snapped back, her warm breath spilling onto the other head's maw. "And if you have already fucking forgotten we share a stomach, and I am doing you a favor eating these bugs for you so shut up and let me eat"

"But... But I'm hungrier than youuuu!" The greedy head exclaimed in response and promptly dove her head down to slip the hand containing all the hydra's collected treats entirely into her gluttonous maw, her lips forming a tight seal around the wrist as her tongue quickly slurped each trainer and pokemon now trapped within the hot, wet expanse of her mouth down into her monstrous gullet, letting out muffled moans of sated bliss as the while.

It was only when she had swallowed down every little being and licked their hand clean of their taste that the greedy head finally release her mouth's seal around their wrist, letting the Alpha head yank it back out and flick it free of the liberal coating of dragon drool now coating its scales, letting out a slew of curses as she did so.

"Do that again and I'll claw that hand down your throat to pull each one back out" She snarled, but her threats fell short on her neighboring head who was too busy rubbing their free hand over their taught hide, breathing a pleasant sigh as she felt their meal beginning to build up in their belly. "Haaa~ So good...”
.
As irritated as she was, the Alpha head couldn't deny her neighbor's claim; neither could any of the other heads, as they all could taste each delicious morsel as if it was their own throat their treats were traveling down. As a hydra, each head shared each others senses, allowing them all to experience the same sensations simultaneously, and the collection of maws each let out a low reverberating purr as the hydra's second claw joined to rub along their momentarily sated belly, licking their lips and shutting their eyes at how wonderful all their squirming prey tasted.

Slowly unlidding her eyes, May prime couldn't help but let out a scoff of amusement at the gall of the trainers she just consumed. Did they really think they could stop her? Did they really think a group of tiny bugs and their even tinier pets could even slow her down never mind *injure* her. Flaring her nostrils, she took in the delectable scent of the crowd of trainers and bystanders that she missed now fleeing from her immense form. She couldn’t waste her time just standing around and enjoying the taste of those she had already eaten, and she still wanted to teach all the bugs in the city a lesson. No, too many delicious morsels within reach, all she had to do was take them; it was time to hunt.

(a/n: This idea is inspired by several sources not just one source, and was originally written by Drez, not me)


Felix had two great passions: being a pokemon trainer and stargazing. Being a trainer meant that Felix spent many a night sleeping under the stars. Felix was your typical trainer in many ways; he had won all the gym badges in his home region of Kalos and attempted to win the championship of the Kalos region. He had lost a match in the semi-finals of the championship and he had a good run at it. After loosing his semi-final match, Felix then decided to journey to the other regions and try to become champion in at least one region; this had mix results. He didn't win any league championship but he didn't allow himself to be down after each defeat. He also spent some time in each region in order to soak in a little of the culture. He was 11 when he decided to journey beyond the Kalos region...he was now twenty and was in the Hoenn region where he had just won a badge from Norman.
Felix's constant companion through all of his journeys was his Delphox who was one of those pokemon that detested being in a pokeball. Felix's Delphox was different in another regard; she was a 'shiny' pokemon, that meant she had different coloring compared to other Delphoxes. Instead of a dark red "robe", she had a purple one and her other fur was light grey. ( she looks like this: http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/2...) She was also quite tall; standing nearly at six feet perhaps because she was a shiny pokemon. Shiny pokemon tended to be taller than the average pokemon.
Like a certain other pokemon trainer, Felix decided to use and catch the pokemon he captured in the region he was currently in. Only Delphox accompanied him everywhere. The rest of his pokemon were all from the Hoenn region.

Felix was lying atop of a high hill somewhere in the Hoenn region in his sleeping bag, gazing up at the stars. It was a perfect night for stargazing without a single cloud in the sky. It was a cool night but not overly so. Felix was wearing his sleepware; a simple t-shirt and sweat pants. His Delphox was a few feet away trying to start a fire without using her powers....she had said she wanted a challenge to see, as she said, "the way humans do it". Like all psychic-type pokemon, Felix's Delphox could talk through telepathy.

"[How you humans manage to survive without powers is beyond me]" muttered Delphox.

"Our power is our minds" replied Felix.

"[Are you saying all pokemon are dumb?]" asked Delphox.

"Not at all" said Felix.

"[It's not that hard to set you on fire]" said Delphox, emitting a low growl as she failed once again to start a campfire with a match.

"Then you would be...." started Felix. He was in the act of turning to face Delphox when he saw something unexpected in the sky. Above the moon was what appeared to be a comet. The tail of the comet trailed behind the comet, which made the moon look like a gigantic eye. "Well, I'd be damned. A comet"

Delphox glanced up at the sky. "[Looks awfully close]"

"It's probably nowhere near Earth" said Felix. "and yet....I don't recall seeing it last night"

"[I don't recall seeing that comet either]" said Delphox. "[a comet out of nowhere.....]"

"Maybe it wasn't close enough to be seen" said Felix thoughtfully.

"[Well....unless you want to come over here and start the fire.....I....]" said Delphox and then her voice faltered and a low growl came from her. Felix looked sharply in the direction of Delphox in time to see her start to glow from the foot up. It looked as if she was starting to evolve. But.....evolve into what? The process was slow, slowly creeping over the legs of Delphox and continued into her torso.

"What on earth?!" asked Felix getting out of the sleeping bag and rushing over to Delphox who was standing at her full height.

"[I don't know what's happening....]" said Delphox. "[....but it feels so good]"

The glowing continued to cover the body of Delphox over the course of a few moments. Felix was completely perplexed. The glowing light then covered all of Delphox and the light became ten times brighter....so bright that Felix had to look away until the light faded. When Felix looked back at his Delphox he was in for a shock.

Delphox was now much more human-looking then before. She was clearly still a pokemon but now she had human-like qualities like breasts.....very big ones, in fact. Her legs, arms and torso looked to belong to a human instead of a pokemon. Her face remained fox-like. She had a lustful expression on her face.

"How in the world....?" asked Felix. "are you okay?"

"....better than okay" said Delphox in a faraway voice.

"You talked without using telepathy!"

Delphox seemed to snap out of whatever state she was in. "What happened to me?! HOW did this happen to me?!"

"I have no Earthly idea" said Felix. Then he glanced up at the sky again. "you don't think that comet caused this to happen, do you?"

Delphox looked up at the sky. "I don't know....maybe I guess.....it's the best explaination for now"

Felix had looked down again at Delphox and found himself staring at her breasts which had to be at least a D-Cup. Felix then quickly averted his eyes.

"I saw that" said Delphox slyly. "you like the new me don't you?"

"Of course" said Felix.

Delphox looked Felix over. "Is it....weird to admit that I find you much more attractive now?"

"Attractive...?" asked Felix.

"Well I am a female and you're a male" said Delphox. "and that.....whatever happened to me....made me horny"

Felix backed up. "You're not suggesting you and I......no....I can't do that"

"Don't you find me alluring this way?" asked Delphox in a sultry voice. "it is close to mating season after all"

Felix fumbled for Delphox's pokeball but he wasn't wearing his belt anymore.

Delphox smiled and walked closer to Felix and put her breasts up against Felix's body. Then Delphox kissed him full on the mouth. Felix tried to resist but his body wouldn't listen to him anymore. He returned the kiss and breathed in her scent which seemed to inflame his lust. He didn't know what it was that inflamed his lust....nor did he much care at the moment. Felix then started to fondle the breasts of Delphox. Delphox made a pleasing sound and grabbed Felix's growing erection. The two broke away from the kiss.

"What's happening to us...?" asked Felix. "we really shouldn't...."

"Shhhhh, shhhh" said Delphox, pushing down Felix's pants. "let's just enjoy this..."


----------------

It was the comet that caused Delphox and other pokemon (not all pokemon) to mutate into a more humanoid shape. Not every pokemon was effected but it also did effect certain humans. The effect was to make humans grow to certain heights. Each human that the comet effected was at a different height. There was also reports that the comet caused a small number of humans to undergo weird and bizarre mutations. The comet would become known as "Felix's Comet" since it was Felix who first saw the comet.


(a/n: Since this is May's story, the story can focus on May now. I just wanted to write an introduction that didn't involve any of the regular cast. I got this idea several weeks ago trying to come up with a new story idea. This idea came from several sources....like the movie "Maxium Overdrive" where a comet caused machines to become sentient. I know a comet making strange things happen isn't exactly new but I just wanted to do something totally bizarre like the story where May turns into a hydra. I would've put this into my own interactive story but since you need a paid membership to do those now.....I just decided to combine that idea with the whole GTS theme of this interactive. The reason I chose Delphox is because that was my starter pokemon from Pokemon Y....although my delphox was a male......)

The sun shone down on the lonely road. It was hot and that was a huge understatement. It was so hot that an egg would boil on the parched grass along the road. "Prepare for trouble!" Ash, Brock, and Max all groaned as Team Rocket started their motto, only to be interrupted as their balloon bounced off of May's huge shoulder, falling to the ground.

"Ouch...you're gonna pay for that, twerps! Where do you get off, shooting us down in the middle of our-- HOLY CRAP!" Jessie freaked out upon realizing that it was not a Pokémon attack that knocked them down, but May, who had somehow grown into a mountain of a girl. "How...how did the girl twerp get so HUGE?!"

May, at this point, just sighed bemusedly at the whole situation-- after what had happened to her, Team Rocket seemed like barely more than a nuisance. "Oh, hey, thanks for noticing," she said sarcastically, placing her hands on her massively flared hips and seemingly not caring that her breasts were exposed. "Yeah, you know, I just figured I'd try a new look...what do you think?" Stumbling a bit on her stubby legs, she stood up to her full height and gave the Rockets quite a scare with her massive girth. None of them could so much as muster a comeback before May reared back, swinging her bulbous belly forward and slamming it into the criminal trio, sending them flying over the horizon with the greatest of ease.

"Looks like Team Rocket's blasting off again...!" May just sighed, having seen this thing far too many times already and being too concerned with her new state of affairs anyway.

Avery, for his part, just stared-- the entire situation was just getting too weird for him. "Okay...I think I've seen enough-- I'm out!" Gathering up whatever of his effects he could find, he ran off, leaving the case of Jumbo-Gro bottles behind. Max was about to take off after him, but stopped dead in his tracks when he heard his sister's huge belly let out another growl.

"Forget him," she said, clutching her grumbling gut. "I'm still hungry, guys!"

12521111.content:
Jessie, James, and Meowth landed with a thud on the hard ground. May had launched the trio several miles away. The trio now were at the edge of a small forest. The trio disentangled themselves from each other and stood up as one.

"How the hell did the twerp get so freaking huge?!!" asked James.

"That's what I want to know" said Jessie.

"Did you guys notice that Pikachu wasn't there?' asked Meowth.

"Who cares about that little rodent?" asked Jessie. "I'm more interested in that huge twerp. How are we going to deal with her?"

"Get as big as her?" asked Meowth.

"Obliviously" said Jessie. 'But how?"

"We could look for whoever was with the twerps maybe" said James thoughtfully. "Remember what she said. It was a new look. That must mean whatever happened to her, it must have happened recently"

Jessie looked over at James. "That's brilliant. But how are we supposed to find him?"

"We're near Slateport...." said Meowth thoughtfully. "Maybe that masked guy is from there?"

"You two must have eyes of an eagle" said James. "I hardly had a glimpse of that masked guy"

-----------------------


May looked at the box of Jumbo-Gro and her stomach growled again.

"You can't possibly be thinking of drinking more of that stuff" said Ash.

"Yes I am' said May.

"You'll get bigger probably" said Max.

'So what?" asked May. "There's nothing left to eat"

May reached for the box of Jumbo-Gro and lifted the whole box to her face

"Don't drink all that!" Yelled Ash. "There's a warning label.... "

"I'm starving" said May. "I don't care what this stuff does to me. Hey, give me that bottle Ash. That's mine"

125211112.content:
Ash looked down at the bottle of Jumbo-Gro for a second then back at May. "No"

"Are you sure about that, i was trying to be nice about this but if you're going to be that way about it then i'll just have to take it from you." May tried to grab Ash with her free hand only for ash to jump out of the way and out of her reach.

"I know your hungry, but if you drink any more of this you'll get even Bigger."

"So, after getting rid of team rocket so easily I'm starting to like being this big. And if being this big feels good then begin bigger probably feels even better." May set the box full of Jumbo-Gro down. "Now one more time, hand over that bottle."

Ash glanced between the Bottle he had, the box May had just set down, and May herself before swallowing hard and staring May right in the eyes. "No."

May glared at Ash for a moment before lunging at him. Ash for his part realized what was about to happen and bolted in the opposite direction of here, leaving him a safe distance from May when she landed and showing no signs of stopping his running.


-----------------

Team rocket wandered around Slateport trying to find the masked man they had seen with the twerps before blasting off from May's newly found size.

"Jessie are you sure this is really the best plan to be following?" James, looking somewhat weary looked over at his red haired cohort.

Jessie, who had been leading the trio, turned around and glared at James. "And do you have a better plan to deal with that giant twerp?"

"Well no, but Slateport isn't a small town what are the chances of running into that masked guy, not to mention he might n to even have come this way, or be wearing that mask. Maybe we can come up with a plan that doesn't rely on finding a specific pers..."

"I, er... we need to figure out how that twerp got so big and that's final." Jessie quickly turned around to continue leading the search only to run into someone, sending both of them to the ground.

"Hey watch where your going." Avery glanced over to the shopping bag full of Jumbo-Gro he had been carrying, relived top see the bottles remained in tact. "Thank goodness, I've already lost enough today don't need to lose my newly purchased plant food as well."

Team rocket stared at Avery for a moment before Meowth piped up "Hey your that masked guy who was with the twerps aint ya?"

"Oh right you're Team...Rocket was it?"

Jesse jumped to her feet pointing down at Avery. "That's right and you're going to tell us exactly how that twerp got so big."

Avery looked somewhat confused at Jessie for a moment before. "Well there's not much to tell really, i was giving that group of kids a ride on my wagon and the girl, accidentally i presume, drank some the Jumbo-Gro plant food i use." Avery started to stand up and dust himself off. "Next thing yo know she was growing out of and destroying my wagon and eating all the watermelons i was planning to sell, but hey at least i found a good deal on some more plant food" Avery was finally back on his feet and realized that Team Rocket was nowhere to be seen. "Well that was rude of them, but at least things are looking..." Avery went to grab his bag of plant food only to find it was missing as well. "...worse than ever."

---------------------

Ash leaned against a tree trying to catch his breath, bottle of Jumbo-Gro in hand. As he watched May's stubby legs and rounded lower body a few dozen yards away slowly push their way through the forest before stopping, her upper body no doubt leaned over parting the tree line in search of him, he started to have second thoughts about trying to keep the bottle of Jumbo-Gro from her. it's not that he suddenly felt like allowing her to subdue her appetite with it, no doubt getting bigger in the process, was a good idea, but he wasn't sure he could keep running much longer and was somewhat afraid of what the angry, 30 foot tall May might do when she found him. If he hadn't stupidly left his pokeballs back at the wreckage of the wagon he might have a way to even the odds against the giant girl, but instead all he had with him was the Bottle of Jumbo-Gro. With that thought Ash suddenly had an idea, he wasn't entirely sure it was a good idea it might be the only one he had."

----------------------

May was bent over slightly, parting the trees with her hands in various spots in the hopes of finding Ash, and the bottle of Jumbo-Gro he was carrying. chasing after Ash had done nothing to suppress her appetite and in fact had made her hungrier. She muttered to herself as she searched another spot, only to be interrupted by a tap on the shoulder.

"Not now, i'm busy" May waved whoever was behind her away before suddenly stopping and realizing what had just happened. Turning around, May found herself face to chest with someone, taking a step back and glancing p she realized that someone was Ash, now 50 feet tall and in a similar shape as herself.

Ash planted his hands on his hips, looking down at My with a smirk, before pulling out the bottle of Jumbo=Gro and waving it over his head. "Looking for this?"

May asked Avery what was going to happen next with no actual answer... So in a attempt to get more comfortable, she goes to stand. But as she does, May let's out a very loud burp! As she burped, her stomach quickly deflated and soon dropped back to what it was originally. It gave her some relief from her tight clothes and she looked normal... well unless you don't count the 2-foot height increase and the well under sized clothes. Brock decided they needed to get May some new clothes, so he asked Avery if he would be nice enough to take them down to the nearest town. She said she could make some alterations to it, but as far as having something bigger, she was out of most of her stock. The restock has been slow due to the heat. She kindly asks May to strip down to her underwear so she can get her measurements. May was a little unsure, but figured she could be trusted. 12532.content:
Mutation. It's what made us evolve from a single-celled organism to the most dominant species of the planet. This process is slow, usually taking hundreds of thousands of years.......but ....every few million years, evolution leaps forward.


May floated through the void. She was holding a tiny, tiny sphere in her hand. The sphere was little more than a grain of sand compared to May. She looked at the infinitesimal small sphere with an expression of remorse and loss. No longer would she enjoy the company of her friends. At least she had finally stopped growing. How much bigger could you get when you've outgrown known existence itself? Now she was in this endless white void. She felt as if she was lying on something soft but it appeared that nothing existed here in this void.....save for her alone.
Yet, she was never alone. For with her endless growth also came power. She was a goddess now. But she couldn't shrink back down to what she once was. She could hear all those countless voices in her head. It was all a jumble even to her.
Her mind drifted back to the day when she started to grow and just didn't stop. Was it only three months ago? It seemed like an entire lifetime ago.......



-------------------

Three months earlier....

May hummed a tuneless melody as she walked down the wide hallway of the mall. Ash and Max were walking behind her carrying bags of stuff that May had bought. It was Princess Day, the day where all women were in charge and men were reduced to little more than slaves.

"Where's Brock?" asked Max. "Shouldn't he be here?"

"He offered to be slave to that Officer Jenny in the food court" said Ash.

"I'm surprised she accepted" said May.

"So am I' said Max.

1253221.content:
Ash and Max had tired out on May, so she decided to continue on her shopping campaign of Princess Day. But unknowingly to May, something was ticking inside of her, something... BIG and it was growing! You see, May unknowingly was reaching the stage in her young girl life where she was going to hit the part of puberty where her height begins to increase in spurts. However, this was going to be far, far from any normal spurt. In fact, this would be a growth spurt to end all growth spurts. But for now, it was a slow cook inside of her and it was only going to be a matter of time till it boiled over and everyone in the world would witness a horrible demise and she would face a over whelming loneliness.

May was standing in front of this one counter and was trying out some of the samples of make-up they had. May knew she was too young to have make-up, but she thought she could get some anyways to see how it looks and when she was older she could use it then. As she was attempting to put some lipstick on, she felt a sudden tingle inside her. It wasn't much, but she could feel her clothes slightly shifting in place. She stood up straight and corrected her shirt and bike shorts. But as she did, she could swear she felt her body change. She paused for a moment and then decided to just ignore it. She continued to try and sample many different types of makeups at the counter. After she was done, the saleswoman gave her a makeup box, free of charge to carry it all. May thanked her and decided to go and track down Ash and Max.

After she returned to the bench they were resting on. She found they were gone! May looked around everywhere and found them at the food court! They still had her stuff, but she figured they would be waiting for her, but instead they were stuffing their faces! May stormed over to them, with her bike shorts slightly riding up her as she rushed over there. Max was slurping on a slushy as he suddenly looked up to see May rushing over. He choked on it and coughed out, "Oh crud, May just noticed we left the bench!" Ash made out most of what he coughed out and before the two could move. May was right on top of them!

"So I let you both rest and when I come back, you both are stuffing your faces?!" May yelled.

"Bu-but sis, we were hungry and we figured you wouldn't be back for a while." Max tried to calmly reply.

May frowned and was meant with a very loud stomach growl. May blushed at this embarrassing moment. "Looks like someone is hungry now, huh?" Max said with a smirkish tone. May grew even more embarrassed, and after giving Max a soft pop to the top of his head, she decided to forgive them. She took a seat and told them both to bring some food and drinks to her. Ash and Max sighed as they wondered how Brock was doing. And well... he was doing great! Officer Jenny was being really nice to him and he was gladly doing every one of her beck and call with the at most grace and timing. Ash and Max brought May her meal and they were shocked to see how quickly she finished it! May let out a mild burp and quickly said, "Excuse me" with a embarrassed look. But what was even more shocking was she was still hungry! She demanded more and they brought her more food and drink. May continued to eat and stuff her face, which was causing her belly to swell slowly in girth a size.

-What's going to happen next?

12533212.content:
Ash Ketchum walked out of the Mount Sanguine Research Center with a distended stomach that caused his clothes to budge out. His clothes were riding up somewhat revealing the bottom of his stomach. The parking lot of the Research Center was devoid of people. Ash glanced around before he ran to a black van with a big letter R on it. As he approached the van, the sliding door opened to reveal Max and Brock

"Where's May?' Asked Max.

"We had to improvise" said Ash.

"Erm.....what happened to your stomach?" asked Brock.

Ash climbed into the van and Max closed the sliding door. The van started its engine and the van drove away from the Research Center.

"You really stole a van from Team Rocket?" asked Ash.

"Ash, where's May?"asked Max.

"It was her idea" said Ash. "She's.....um.....in my stomach"

"WHAT?!!!"

"She's perfectly safe" said Ash. "She told me that she can pretty much survive anywhere now. We had to hurry to avoid being caught. So.....who's driving?"

Max and Brock exchanged looks. Max shrugged.

"I am" said a familiar voice from the driver's seat. James glanced back at the stunned Ash.

"Why are you helping us?" asked Ash.

"I'm doing my good deed for the year" muttered James.

It was four days earlier when May had been snatched from the streets of Saffron City by persons unknown driving a red van. May and Max had been vacationing in the Kanto region.
It took Max four days to track down the red van that had driven off with May with the help of Officer Jenny along with Ash and Brock.

-------------------------------

"What happened to May?" asked Max now.

"She tried to escape yesterday and slipped and fell into a vat of some kind of goo" said Ash. "It changed her......into some kind of goo being"

"What?" asked Brock faintly.

Ash patted his stomach hard. "Come on out May"

May exited through Ash's mouth. It took her a handful of moments for May to fully exit Ash. Once she was freed from Ash, May had been nothing but a puddle of green goo. But she reformed into a humanoid shape. She was made out of a thick gelatinous substance that was transparent: you could see right through her. May still looked like herself minus being made out of goo.

"May" said Max. "What happened to you? Who kidnapped you?"

"I'm not entirely sure" said May. "I was out for most of it. When I tried to escape I didn't see anybody's faces. They all wore masks"

12533222.content:
Alright, so this idea-- much like the "Misty's Gain- The Continuation" one elsewhere on this interactive-- will be an attempt at "rescuing" a genuine old-school story that I thought had a lot of potential, but was never continued. In this case, I credit it to its original author, former Writing.com member SpeedDemon, whose unfinished story "The Power of Wishing" over on VGGTS was an early favourite of mine. This will be SIMILAR to the already-listed Jirachi option further up, but with a different twist, namely that May would gain the ability to grow as big as she wants at will from the Millennium Comet wish and use her power to fight an evil outside force.

However, I'll be making my own additional twist onto that, as the original fic's idea of an invasion by silly-named aliens was...more than a little "ehh" (no offence-- it WAS a long time ago). So instead, I'll take the original pitch and merge it with some stuff from ORAS; May would make a wish on a falling star during the Litleonids shower, not knowing that the one she picked was Jirachi, and gets her growth powers just in time to defend against an invasion by Deoxys. We can have it take place in the anime, gameverse, or a hybrid of the two, so you can have Ash, Brendan, or both as her companions/love interest. And this time, there would be actual clothes-ripping/nudity. :P And we'd preserve the original fic's idea of May having been a closet macrophile since she was a little kid-- kudos to Mr. SpeedDemon for that idea, heh.

1253322221.content:
(Sorry that the link didn't work in the previous chapter)




Ash, Misty and Brock were all going to the city of Hidden Springs that was located in a canyon somewhere between the Kanto and Sinnoh regions. The canyon itself was quite a large one carved by a wide river. It wasn't particularly a deep canyon. It was barely half a mile down.
The town was known for its spring which was hidden....so the name of the city wasn't too imaginative. It was also known as a popular vacation spot.


Ash, Misty and Brock were down in the canyon on a dirt road that led to the city of Hidden Springs. They were less than five miles from the city according to the map that Brock had. Pikachu was riding on Ash's shoulder. Misty was lagging a little behind as she was getting tired from all the walking.
"We're almost there" said Brock.
"That's what you said ten minutes ago" said Misty dryly.
Ash was about to add his two cents when he spotted a giant footprint. He stopped short and looked at the print. It looked like it belonged to somebody that would have been fifty feet tall. Brock and Misty had also stopped and looked at the large footprint.
"That's a big foot" said Brock.
"Fake obviously" said Misty.
"Oh. It isn't fake" said a feminine voice. Ash and the others looked around until they spotted a 50 foot tall woman with blue hair. The woman was standing in the river which barely came to her waist. The river was perhaps 100 feet away. The woman was naked and it took the three a moment to recognize who the woman was. It was clearly an Officer Jenny. She smiled cheerily at the stunned looks of the three pokemon trainers. As they watched, the giant Jenny stepped out of the river and walked towards them. Ash, Brock and Misty backed off more than a little nervous understandably.
"Don't worry" said Jenny coming right up to the three and looked down at them all. "I won't hurt you. I'm still an Officer above all else"
"How did you get to be so tall?" asked Brock who was ogling the naked officer.
"It's the springs in town" said Jenny. "There are two springs in a cave just outside town. One spring will make you grow if you drink from it.....and the other one will shrink you....The more you drink the taller or smaller you become"
"Extraordinary...." said Ash faintly who couldn't help but oggle Jenny. Misty glared and bonked Ash and Brock with her handy mallet.
"It certainly is" said Jenny. "The town is a popular spot for honeymooners"

Ash, Brock, Serena, Bonnie and Clemont were all going to a Hidden Ruins that was located in a canyon surrounded by other canyons and mountains somewhere on the far outskirts of the Kalos region. There they'd meet Professor Sycamore to investigate the ruins and some ancient tech that didn't seem so ancient.



The canyon itself was quite a large one carved by a wide river. It wasn't particularly a deep canyon. It was barely half a mile down.
The ruins were pretty newly discovered.



Our heroes were down in the canyon on a dirt road that led to the archeological site. They were less than 7 miles from the city according to the map that Brock had. Pikachu was riding on Ash's shoulder.



Bonnie, Clemont, and Serena were lagging a little behind as they were getting tired from all the walking.

"We're almost there" said Brock.


"That's what you said ten minutes ago" said Serena dryly.
Ash was about to add his two cents when he spotted a giant footprint. He stopped short and looked at the print. It looked like it belonged to somebody that would have been over 50 feet tall.



Brock, Clemont , Serena and Bonnie had also stopped and looked at the large footprint.


"That's one big foot" said Brock.


"Fake obviously" said Clemont.

"That pun wasn't very funny tho" said Bonnie.


In truth both Bonnie and Serena held curiosity over the footprint for different yet similar reasons.



Brock glanced at the guide book but decided not to share the words therein
"Rumor has it There are two hidden springs in 2 separate hidden caves nearby. One spring will make you grow if you drink from it.....and the other one will shrink you....The more you drink the taller or smaller you become. These rumors and legends are as of yet unconfirmed."



In truth they had no idea what had transpired a mere few days before their arrival. Brock shrugged it off still doubtful that there was any grain of truth and suspected the footprint was some elaborate prank or landmark.

In truth they had no idea what had transpired a mere few days before their arrival. Brock shrugged it off still doubtful that there was any grain of truth and suspected the footprint was some elaborate prank or landmark.


****5 days ago****

A young red head girl 4'8 was visiting the nearest town to the ruins. The girls name was Liv.
http://m.imgur.com/TwVnolO

The girl unfortunately somehow got lost and separated from her friends.
It had started to rain luckily she'd found a cave or rather a network of impossibly huge caves to seek shelter in. The caves extended far underground. A strange luminous glow lit up the caves and walls dimly but enough to see.



Thirsty and hungry she explored the caves.
As luck would have it she'd found a set of springs down one bath. Oddly the twin springs were a hot springs and a cool lake side by side somehow. Realizing she'd gotten dirty and lacking food she decided on a drink and a bath.



She drank a bit of lake water then she undressed and hopped into the hot springs.
She cleaned herself as best as she could without any proper cleaning supplies.


Some time later she got out. Her thirst quenched earlier and her bath needs met.
As she stood up she felt strange but the feeling soon passed. Little did she realize she'd just lost 3 inches in height. Her thirst soon returned so she made her way back to the lake.



On the way the strange feeling came and went again. She'd unknowingly lost another 3 inches. This time she bent down and took a bigger gulp from the lake than earlier. As Liv headed back to her clothing she realized she was still wet and chilled. She let out a sneeze. As she did so she dropped another few inches.



This time the strange feeling was stronger and lasted longer as Liv walked back towards the hot springs. As she did things started to feel off. As she approached the boulder her clothes were laid out on it started to dawn on her the ceiling seemed further and further away.



The boulder in front of her appeared to be getting larger too. A few "small" rocks were scattered on the cave floor near the boulder.
http://m.imgur.com/7UtLt09
Live looked around shocked.


"Huh what's going on" she asked stumbling backwards on a previously "small" rock.
A couple of minutes later she felt something cool and smooth under her and between her legs.
http://m.imgur.com/UfIfNbE
https://twitter.com/pklewd2015/status/77...


She then realized she was straddling a rock that once would have fit in her hand, facing forward as if it were a lover.

"Ehh another boulder? But everything is still getting bigger"


Her feet soon left solid ground as her position on the "growing boulder" shifted.
Finally everything stopped growing.

While awaiting for another Contest performance. The young Pokemon Coordinator named Dawn, was prepping for the current contest she was about to perform in. She had made a brand new Poffin. It had a red hue color to it, with a blue spiral. It was made with a rare candy and a few other ingredients. It was truly a odd looking Poffin, but man did they look good. Dawn's Piplup really liked the batch she made before and she had to make sure he didn't eat the all again and get a really bad stomach ache. While Dawn was prepping the final look of her Poffins. Her rival, Ursula was watching from afar. She was a little peeved she had been on a losing streak as of late and decided maybe it was time to even up the score just a little. So while Dawn had her back turned. She walked over to the plate and sprinkled some odd looking dust across the Poffin. She quickly walked away and Dawn didn't even notice the added ingredient.

Ursula giggled as she thought of what was going to happen. Apparently the substance she added is suppose to cause a Pokemon to get drowsy. Which would be enough to throw Dawn off and give her a chance to turn her lose streak around. As everyone continued to prep. Dawn's stomach growled and she was pretty hungry. There was nothing nearby except for the Poffin's she made. She wasn't sure, but decided to take one and eat it. The flavor at first was bitter, but quickly turned to sweet. Dawn grabbed her cheeks and blushed by how good it tasted. It was indescribable! I mean she had tried a Poffin before, but they are really more tasty to pokemon. But this one was so good, it was good enough to eat more. But Dawn decided not to, since she needed enough for her pokemon. So she placed them into a jar in her bag.

[20 Minutes Later...]

The Contest was underway and everyone was doing their best. Ursula did pretty well as she thought to herself, "Oh wow, maybe I don't even need Dawn to lose now, this is great!" Next up was Dawn she was wearing a pretty dark blue dress with a black apron tie-in and small black hat on her head. She looked like she was wearing alternate costume of Alice from Wonderland. It was really cute on her and this made Ursula very worried and now her only hope was for Dawn's Pokemon to fall asleep. But to Ursula's surprise, her Pokemon didn't even look sleepy! This upset her, that is till she noticed Dawn was starting to get sleepy eyed. Which she thought was odd, but figured. Hey, who ever is getting sleepy will work. Ursula figured she would take a bite of the poffin and then dash out of the room quickly to insure Dawn didn't know she had tainted her puffin. But just as Ursula was up to take a bite of the tainted puffin. She suddenly heard Dawn groan in pain!

Dawn held her sides in bed, "Owww, I-I don't know! I just suddenly started feeling major pain in my stomach!" Dawn cried out.

Ursula started to worry now, "Oh crud, did I poison her!? I could get in to serious trouble for this!" Ursula panicked inside her head and started to step back and thought, "Maybe I should run or wait... that would make me look guilty. Then I should get help?"

But soon her racing mind was bombarded with more trouble as Dawn appeared to be changing in front of her? Ursula stopped and watched as Dawn appeared to be growing in size!? Ursula shook her head, "Wait what!? What's going on here!?" she thought.

Dawn's pain grew worse, but so was her whole body! Dawn quickly started to increase in size and it wasn't taking long to look noticeable either. Soon Dawn's hospital gown was starting to pull tightly across her whole frame which was a little oversized before all of this. She grabbed the gown with panic, "Wha-What's going on, why is my hospital gown so tight on me!" Dawn then noticed it was getting tighter, "Oh my GOSH! Is it shrinking more?! What's happening!/" Dawn questioned with such panic in her voice.


Ursula gulped and was about to explain what was happening, but does she?

132.content:
How could have this happened? The three of us captured by mere humans?


We're in dire straights here, Azelf...we need help from those three humans we connected with

Do we just teleport them here without...AHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!

AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!

AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!! BRING THEM HERE!! THE THREE OF US MUST BRING THEM HERE!



Dawn woke with a start and instantly shivered. She was having the dream again....no...it was more like a flashback; dreams were elusive and filled with impossible things. It wasn't a dream at all. It was a memory being played over in Dawn's mind...the time when she, Ash and Brock had helped saved the Lake Trio from Team Galactic. But why was she having a dream about an event that had happened years ago? Dawn thought back. Ash, Brock and herself were riding in Cynthia's SUV when the Three had teleported them right into Team Galactic's HQ. In her dream she had heard the Three legendary pokemon talking to each other....when they had decided to teleport Ash, Brock and Dawn.

Dawn was lying in bed in her house in Twinleaf Town. After all these years, the memory of saving the Three Lake Pokemon was still fresh in her mind. It was like it had happened yesterday. Dawn looked out of the window and saw it was mid-morning.

"Dawn!" came her mother's voice from downstairs. "shouldn't you be off to meet your old friends?"

"Ah, crap!" yelled out Dawn. "that's right! I totally forgot!"

Dawn had found that Ash and Brock were in Sinnoh a few days ago. Ash had called Dawn just yesterday to let her know. He explained that he had been having a dream about the Lake Guardian that he had bonded with--Azelf--that told him to return to Sinnoh. Brock, at the same time, had been dreaming about Uxie--the Lake Guardian that had bonded with him--and Uxie had told Brock to return to Sinnoh also. At the time Dawn hadn't been dreaming about Mespirit...but on this morning she had dreamed about the Three, not just Mespirit. Ash, Brock and Dawn were to meet in front of the Pokemon Center in Twinleaf Town.

Dawn jumped out of bed and put on her usual outfit. She ran down the stairs and waved a goodbye to her mother and headed off to meet her two old friends.

When Dawn had arrived at the Pokemon Center on her bike, there was Ash and Brock waiting for her. The three friends greeted each other warmly and after a bit of talking, they each decided to have breakfast at a near restaurant. The three talked things over breakfast.

"So why do you think that those Lake Guardians called us back to Sinnoh?" asked Brock. "They're not in trouble again, are they?"

"I doubt it" said Ash. "No, I was under the impression that each of the Three would like to give us some kind of reward for saving them. Azelf told me so.....well..perhaps not flat-out said it"

"After all these years?" asked Dawn.

"The Three spent those years bickering about what kind of reward" said Brock. "Uxie told me all about that. Rather forcefully I might add"

"Couldn't they have given our rewards anyway?" asked Dawn. "without contacting the three of us or bringing us back together?"

"Kanto is probably too far away" said Ash. "even those Three have limits"

"Pika" chimed in Pikachu who was sitting on Ash's shoulder as usual.

"So...do we go to the lakes?" asked Dawn. "or what?"

"Going to the lakes sounds like a fine idea!" said Ash. "....uhh...which lake is closer?"

Brock whipped out a map and looked over it. "Lake Verity. It's right outside town"

"Isn't that the home of Mespirit?" asked Ash.

"Yeah.." said Dawn.

Dawn is a Pokemon Coordinator and is set to try and win her latest Pokemon Contest event. The crowd was cheering loudly as this contest was filled with many great teams or Coordinators, But none of them were drawing the crowd like Dawn was today. She was feeling so upbeat and confident for some reason, she didn't know why, but it was amazing!! The Pokemon Coordinator next in line went on as Dawn awaited her turn to act. Dawn took her first few steps and waved to everyone. As she did this, she saw Ash and Brock in the stands above and May was giving her a thumbs up from the line-up. Dawn smiled and knew she couldn't lose. She sent out Mamoswine and Piplup for her performance. It went off great as she matched brute strength of her Mamoswine and the soft dance of Piplup. The crowd was just loving it and so were the judges. Dawn had one last move she had been thinking of trying, but was unsure if she could pull it off. But you wouldn't know till she tried. Dawn smiled and then commanded for Piplup to start spinning on his tippy toe with his beak aiming straight in the air. Piplup did this, while Dawn had her Mamoswine use a mild sized Icicle Crash up into the air above Piplup. Mamoswine created this Icicle and after it formed, it fell straight down toward Piplup and landed on his beak! But to everyone's surprise, Piplup was able to hold it up... well sort of. Piplup heard the command and did just that. When he did however, the powdered snow that was resting on top of it already, began to spin and twirl above and around the stage, with a steady stream still hitting it, caused the stage to become a beautiful snow wonderland. Everyone was just simply amazed by this performance. Then Dawn took in a deep breath and went for the final part of her Performance. "Now Piplup, launch it into the air and Mamoswine, crash through it!" Dawn commanded. Piplup leaped up to launch the Icicle into the air, with Mamoswine rushing forward and then a mild leap into the air to crash through it. Leaving a beautiful icy rainbow behind him. After they both landed back on stage, the crowd just up roared, including the other contestants. The judges clapped and looked at each other. After the contest was over and they went on to picking who wins. It was decided that the obvious choice was... Dawn! Dawn and May held hands as they both jumped for joy. May congratulated her on her win and Dawn walked over to claim her prize.

After the contest was over, Dawn was changing out of her outfit as she heard a knock at her door. She walked over to see who it was and it was a older woman in a business suit. "May I help you?" Dawn asked. The lady smiled and was...
