135.content:
A Zoroark stood at the very edge of the forest watching the lone human come ever closer. The Zoroark was well-hidden from view. The lone human that was approaching was at least nineteen years old--or maybe even in his late 20's. Zoroark had a hard time telling a human's age by sight. The point was that the human was young but not too young. The human was wearing jeans along with a dark red shirt and a wide-brimmed hat. He had handsome features. He was also pretty buff like he had spent most of the time at a gym--a real gym and not a Pokemon Gym. The Zoroark watched in silence as the human came ever closer. Then the Zoroark noticed that the young human had pokeballs on his belt....which meant he was a trainer.

"[Here comes another human in our midst]" said a rich female voice in Zoroark's head. The Zoroark looked around until she saw her partner-in-crime. A Delphox was a rare sight in the Sinnoh region but not completely unheard of. The Delphox walked up right next to the Zoroark and the pair watched silently as the human entered the forest some 100 feet away from the pair.

"[Don't scare him off]" said the Delphox, speaking via telepathy to the Zoroark.

The Zoroark threw the Delphox a look.

"[At least, not yet]" said the Delphox. "[I sense that he isn't as bad as the last human that wandered into our forest]"

"[That last human was a bad one]" said Zoroark through telepathy. "[what makes this human different?]"

"[I sensed he has a kind heart towards all pokemon]" said the Delphox. "[...and that he comes from the Kalos region.....]"

"[So what's the plan? Do we let him.....stay?]"

"[You wanted human companionship didn't you?]" asked Delphox. "[let's play this by ear for now]"




One Month later.....

"Man, it's great to be back" said Ash Ketchum.

Ash, Dawn and Brock were reunited once again in the Sinnoh region. Ash had heard something about a forest of illusions that had suddenly appeared in the Sinnoh region about two months back. A total of ten trainers had tried to investigate the mysterious forest but they had all come back half-crazy save for one trainer that didn't return. The trainers that did come back talked about meeting up with a dark-skinned pokemon that could create all kinds of realistic illusions. Ash wanted to catch a pokemon like that....it would be cool to own a pokemon that could create illusions.
Dawn had heard about the forest of illusions also and so did Brock.
The three friends had met up in Floaroma Town which was somewhat close to the forest of illusions.
"Pika pi pika chu" chimed in Pikachu who was on Ash's shoulder.
"Piplup pi pip" said Piplup.
"So nobody knows where this mysterious forest came from then?" asked Brock.
"Nope" said Dawn. "one day the forest wasn't there....and then, poof, the forest was suddenly there like it was there all along"
"The nine trainers that came back were all half-crazy" said Ash. "said that there's a pokemon there that could create illusions...."
"Sounds like Zoroark" said Brock thoughtfully.
"I wonder if that's the same one we saw in Crown City" said Ash.
"I doubt it" said Dawn. "there's probably a million Zoroark in the world"

1411.content:
Ash, Iris, and Cilan were traveling through the region of Unova. Things were pretty much average as the gang was traveling to their next destination. However, Iris was getting a little board with all the same old, same old, feeling. As nothing had been happening for a while now and heck! Not even a show up from Team Rocket! So things have been pretty bland to say the least.

But soon our heroes arrived at an odd location in Unova, it was a super massive water and theme park! Iris's eyes quickly became delighted and she ran down the hill. Ash was a little confused, but Cilan explained that he had heard about a water/theme park opening up just recently around theses parts. Ash became super delighted and rushed down the hill behind Iris. Cilan chuckled and decided to follow suit, though he didn't run like the other two did.

As they reached the park, the ticket booth clerk asked for how many and gave them three tickets as they answered three. All three rushed inside and boy was it packed and there was just so much of everything everywhere! From huge slides, massive coasters, you name it! Iris was so excited as she didn't know which one she wanted to try as Ash was doing the same and Iris then made the comment, "Ash your such a kid..."

Ash frowned slightly at that, but that didn't stomp out his enthusiasm. Everyone picked there own ride, with Ash and Iris going to the same one. Though they needed to change first and they did. Ash wore some blue trunks with black and yellow strikes on the sides, Iris wore a purple one-piece swimsuit with some flower décors all over it, and Cilan wore a green trunk shorts with a single white strike across one side.

But as Ash and Iris went on to one of the bigger rides, the attendant stopped Iris, "I'm sorry little one, you can't enter this ride..."

"What for?" Iris asked.

"For one you look too young and secondly, you are just under the height requirement... so it's no go on this ride for you."

"I guess you are the kid really Iris." Cilan mentioned.

Iris grew upset and walked up with anger. Though Cilan was just teasing her about how she is always calling Ash a kid. Iris walked to the deep end of the park and seemed a bit bummed out. As that was one of the rides she really wanted to try first. So she sat on a bench and tried to calm down enough and think of what ride she could try. That was when she noticed something sitting in between a small spacing in the wall. She stepped up to it and pulled it out. It appeared that when they built this place, this thing was built into it. Iris explained this oddly shaped gold item with a blue sapphire in the center.

She glided her fingers lightly across the gem as it suddenly grew bright and shot a beam of light into the air and then something fell near a bush beside the bench. Iris was startled by this and didn't know what she had just done. But then suddenly a odd Pokemon floated softly out of the bushes and it yawned.

Iris walked up to it and asked if it was a Pokemon and to her surprise it talked! As it spoke to her and told her it was.

"Wha-wait, you can talk! But Pokemon can't talk!" Iris cried out in confusion.

"I actual can't talk, but I am speaking to you telepathically. So what is the wish you like for me, Jirachi to grant?" Jirachi asked in a soft tone.

Iris paused and then realized what this Pokemon just asked, "Wait you can grant me wishes?!" Iris asked.

The Legendary Pokemon nodded, but added it could only grant one. Iris dropped her shoulders as she was hoping for one of those times when you get three wishes and what not, but a real wish is a wish after all she thought.

"So you can really grant me a wish right?" Iris asked.

Jirachi nodded, "Yes, just one however and then I go back to sleep."

Iris paused, "Okay, so just one... but what?" she thought.

Then a quick thought came to mind, "Oh wait! I know what I would like to wish for! Jirachi I wish to be taller!" Iris wished.

Jirachi paused, "Oh, okay... well are you sure?"

Iris nodded, "YES, just please grant me my wish to be taller. Then I can really show everyone who are the kids." Iris giggled.

Jirachi shrugged, "Okay then... well you wish is granted and good night." Jirachi said just before yawning.

A beam of light appeared and the legendary Pokemon disappeared once again. Iris smiled, but quickly frowned. "Hey! Why am I still the same height?!" Iris said while checking herself. She buffed her cheeks and grew really upset.

"I can't believe I was tricked! I mean even if I grew just an inch would have been great..." Iris said to herself.

But there was nothing she could do and she decided to walk to a nearby concession. But while she did this, she was slowly starting to change? Though unknown to Iris, she should have worded her wish a LOT better. But she was going to find that out quite soon enough.

As the movie progressed, things only grew weirder and weirder as the movie continued. Soon it was getting to the main point and the look-a-like Serena in the movie, who name was Aneres. Entered into a attic in her friend's house. Her friend had a little sister that liked to play hide and seek. So she went up there to see if she was hiding up there. But what she found instead was a strange tri-pod with a long ray-gun on top of it. She walked up to it and started to mess with it. It lite up with a bunch of colors and then started to hum. "How odd, what is this thing?" Aneres asked herself. But then suddenly, someone popped out from some boxes and startled her as she fell onto her butt. "Ouch, that really hurt!" Aneres said with pain as she rubbed her butt. The person who popped up was the little sister of her friend and she was giggling from what she did. Aneres didn't think it was so funny.

1511121.content:
As Bonnie jumped onto the couch to watch some TV with Serena, her palm hit the remote and caused it to press several buttons and she accidently purchased a odd movie by the title of
A Growing Sister Story!


As the movie started it Serena and Bonnie couldn't help noticing the main characters looked remarkably similar to them all with slight differences

The part of Serena was slightly shorter , pudgy , had different color eyes and hair.

The part of Clemont had freckles and black hair.

The part of Bonnie was 2 years older, had Pichu instead of Dedenne and had brown hair.

And the Ash had Red hair


As the movie went on the plot became clearer.

The Serena and Bonnie doppelgängers stumbled upon a comet with Deoxys in it.
Both are bathed in a strange aura.


As it progresses 1 of the girls slowly shrinks in size
While the other slowly grows bigger.

The shrinking girl shrinks very little and slowly
The growing girl on the other hand seems to grows more than than the other shrinks and has more spurts.


As the movie progresses hijinks ensue and while the one girl only shrinks to 1/8 her normal size the growing girl continues to grow and grow in spurts.
The movie seems super long.
As the growing girl approached the size then exceeded of a mountain Deoxys reappeared.


Oddly although the girl is worried about harming others and how the world views her she doesn't want to shrink back and even begs and pleas and cries to stay Big.

She then crawls away from Deoxy's

"Please go away and let me stay like this"


Deoxys looks on intently.

As she's crawling away Deoxy's speaks psychically to her.

"Is this really what you want? You're so large you have to crawl just to have mobility! There's no telling if your body or the planet can take it"

She continued to crawl away unswayed.

"I don't care as long as my friends and sister are safe! I like being big and getting bigger feels good! Please just change my sister back and let be the one uncured. I want to grow as big as possible and survivable"


As the girl continued crawling away carefully she stopped.
A familiar feeling returned and the naked giantess began to grow even bigger still.

Deoxys then started to glow as the girl grew.

Mid way thru the recent growth spurt something went wrong wit the movie rental.


The screen froze and gave playback errors then suddenly the TV went back to the menu with no record of the movie being rented or available.


Little did the girls or our heroes know they'd soon live out the movie.

Idea based in part off this tumblr video w/o the crazy proportions n such

http://commoddity.tumblr.com/post/158036...

----------


It was a typical day in the Kalos region.
Our heroes were once more visiting Lumios City.


Currently the gang was inside a new sweets cafe secretly run by Team Rocket
Unfortunately it wasn't just Jessie, James and Meowth.
Cassidy, Butch and various other rocket operatives were undercover.


Being the typical bad guys they are though some stuff was overpriced and undersized.



A Hex Maniac girl had just received her desert order and was displeased at the size.
Looking around with no one in the immediate area she looked at her bit sized macaroon.
She then chanted a hex.


Her small pink treat glowed a bit.
Then it grew 50% larger in size.
The Hex Girl waited a bit and soon the desert grew another 50%
It was now twice its original size yet still small.
The Hex Girl considered letting it grow more but decided to not draw attention to herself.


She was about to stop the hex when a meowth and Wobbuffet came running past knocking her down.from her seat at the cafe counter.
They were chasing a Zorua.

"Get back here you thief dose are primo Ingres you're nabbing" yelled Meowth.

"Wobba Wobbuffet"


While the Hex Girl was distracted a new waitress noticed the order on the counter.

"Oh my someone must have gotten their orders mixed up. I guess I'll just take this over to that group that has the gym leader with them"

With that she grabbed the hexed macaroon.


Moments later she arrived at Ash's table with a few plates.

"Ok sorry for the wait. For the adorable little girl we have a deluxe pink delight" said the waitress giving Bonnie's the hexed treat.

"For the Pokémon we have the PokéRoon platter. For the gym leader we have this. For the showcase finalist we have a smoothie and a delight parfait. Lastly for the Kalos league finalist we have a club sandwich and a mini macaron sampler. Enjoy"


Within seconds of the waitress departing Bonnie eyed the hexed desert.
"Aww it looks kinda small"
With that she ate the thing fairly fast.


"Yummy but I'm still hungry" complained Bonnie.


"We don't want you spoiling your appetite but you are a growing girl so I'll share with you" said Clemont.
He then gave her 1 of his.


Little did either of them know that Bonnie's 1st one was hexed.
Nor were they aware that the hex would transfer to Bonnie herself or that because it was originally intended for deserts the 2nd one she ate would become hexed too making her twice hexed.

They soon finished.
The Hex Girl finally got up and noticed her desert was gone.


"Hey waitress what happened to my Macaron"


"Oh I'm sorry your order seemed to be someone else so I gave it to that person. In fact the group seems to be leaving. It's the group with the adorable little girl there"
She said pointing to the group that was walking out.


"Are you crazy? Do you have any idea what you might've just done."


The Hex Girl was about to take off when an officer Jenny approached.

"Miss please calm down. I was called here for a commotion and a theft but I also noticed you're disturbing the peace and trying to run out on your tab"


Meanwhile Bonnie as of yet seemed unaffected.

15133131.content:
It had another eventful day on our heroes journey through the Jalos region.

Our heroes had stopped yet another Team Rocket plan and even a Team Flare plot.
Now they were on the run.
Currently Bonnie was protecting a Jirachi from being caught while the others acted as a distraction.


Unfortunately Bonnie had slipped off a cliff and was hanging onto a tree branch.


The Jirachi in her bag looked at her worriedly as did her brothers Dedenne.


Bonnie tried to pull them up but wasn't strong enough.
She started to reminisce about being younger with Clemont, a visit to Prism Tower in Lumios, and then think about her current situation.


Absentmindedly she thought and remembered aloud.
"It's no use I'm not strong enough! I wish I were bigger, I wish I were bigger than big, I wish I were big enough that I'd never have to rely on the others again"



Jirachi heard her wish and began to glow brightly as did Bonnie.
Dedenne looked on.
Jirachi flew out of Bonnie's bag and thru the sky then vanished.
Bonnie stopped glowing.


Suddenly the branch breaks but just as Bonnie and Dedenne are about to fall Clemont arrives and pulls her up.

"Phew that was close. By the way we need to start watching your diet. I'm dunno why but you feel a little heavier.
In truth Bonnie has unbeknownst to them grown 2 1/2 inches taller and proportionally bigger from head to toe.

151331331.content:
The sun shone down on the lonely road. It was hot and that was a huge understatement. It was so hot that an egg would boil on the parched grass along the road.


Our heroes were in a harsh Kalosian desert area. They had been hiking for some time when they finally happened upon a farm slash ranch.



A gruff stern looking man was tending to some ground near some berries.


"Well howdy there strangers"


The group couldn't believe that he seemed so unbothered by the heat.


"I... Need water Clemont" whined Bonnie.



"I take it y'all are city folk" said the man.
"Well if y'all wanna rest and wet your whistle you're welcome to do so"

With that he grabbed Ash, Serena and Clemont a drink.

"Sorry youngin I ran out of drinks out here but while your friends rest in the shade you're free to grab what you like in the house"


Bonnie nodded and made her way into the house. Inside she saw interesting decor.
Within moments she happened upon a shelf.
On it was a few boxes.



Bonnie opened the closet box to her. She saw bottles galore. She selected 2 bottles as she was quite thirsty, opened 1 and took a drink without looking at the label. What entered her mouth was certainly not water but a sweet tasting liquid that tasted just like candy.
It was also oddly cool.



"'Mmm yummy" said Bonnie. She quickly drank the 1st bottle. She made her way outside started on the 2nd which was identical to the 1st.


Bonnie stepped onto the porch gulping down the last of the 2nd bottle.


She was about to ask what the drink was when she glanced at the labels:
Berry Plentiful Garden Jumbo Gro.


Both had under the writing the same pictures.
A normal sized Berry, then one 2x its size then one 3x that size.


"Huh that was plant food?" Questioned Bonnie.


"I'm a berry rancher and farmer in case you hadn't noticed youngin" said the man. "I use a special type of plant food----say, you didn't drank that stuff did you?!"


"Yea for plant food it was amazingly delicious" said Bonnie.


"Uh-oh that's not good" said the man nervously.


"Bonnie what were you thinking? What's going to happen to my sister" panicked Clemont.


"Well hopefully nothing but truth be told I've only tested it on my berries and veggies. There was one instance tho where a caterpie grew about 30% larger after eating my corn"

"I'm afraid tis' true, why I just told these two that a caterpie grew about 30% larger after eating my corn" the seller said. Nervous drops of sweat trickle down Serena's face. "Is something else the matter miss?"
"So it's t-true? The person WILL grow?" She asked nervously. "I just saw Ash drink these." She showed the four empty pictures of which were identical to the two Bonnie drank out of. "Not that I know of. That caterpie grow for a few days and moderately shrank back to normal in another few days. However, I don't know how long it'll last for your friends here." Just then...

15133133331.content:
Our heroes had stopped for a break between gym battles for Ash.
Currently they were in a town known for its bath houses and slightly taller than average females.


Brock who had recently met up with them for old time sake was extremely excited.


Currently the group along with Brock were at a Pokémon Center which had An attached public bath house.



It was evening and everyone was in the Japanese style baths.
The boys were of course on the men's side.
Bonnie and Serena were on the fairly empty women's side.




As Serena disrobed Bonnie looked on in childlike adoration as usual. Tonight tho Serena seemed even more amazing.
Perhaps the steam in the heated bath was working wonders.


"Wow big sis Serena you look so amazing as always, such nice skin and tall! I can't wait to be big like you someday"
said the younger girl.


"Aww you're so sweet Bonnie. It's like I have the perfect little sister. Don't worry you'll grow bigger someday for now tho I'll help care for you starting with this bath" replied the older girl as she removed Bonnie's towel.



Serena sat on a stool behind Bonnie while the smaller younger girl was on another smaller stool.
Serena began to lather up Bonnie with a bar of soap when it slipped from her hand and slid down the drain grate in the bath.

"Darn I lost the soap. Can you stay out while I grab a new bar"


Bonnie nodded.
Moments later after Serena left a girl approached Bonnie.

"Hi there runt. I couldn't help but hear you'd like to be bigger"

Bonnie looked at this girl and was in awe.
She looked like Serena but with red hair , even better skin , mysterious silver eyes and most notably was very tall for a girl Serena's age and even slightly tall were she a grown up.

"Wow you're even taller than Serena! I'm so jealous"


The girl grinned.
"I'll take that reply as a yes?"


"Yea I'd do just about anything to be as big as big sister Serena or you miss! You're both so amazing"


"Well then I have a little gift for you. Make sure you keep it safe and only use it on yourself"
With that the girl gave Bonnie a unique and large bar of soap in a wrapper.


Bonnie was about to thank the girl when she vanished.
She looked at the label.
Super Suds Super Nutrient Soap, guaranteed to make the User grow healthier and feel better with each use and each rinse. Caution DO NOT Ingest and avoid excessive contact with liquids within 3 hours of each use.


Bonnie was admittedly curious.

She opened it and lathered herself up.
She felt odd tingles run through her body and felt oddly good and energized.
The feelings stopped within seconds of her rinsing the suds off.


"Wow this soap really does feel good. From now on I'll have to clean myself and use it"

Wanting to feel good again she lathered up again.
The tingles and feelings returned.
She rinsed and repeated a few times before Serena returned.


"Hey I found more soap but there's not enough for 2 of us" said Serena.


"No worries this kind girl gave me some" said Bonnie.

"Ah well then would you like me to finish"


"No thanks big sis in fact if I'm ever going to grow up I'd like to start doing my own bathing from now own"


"Wow that's very mature of you Bonnie! You're growing up into a good young lady already"


With that Bonnie does one last lather and rinse with the soap.

The girls finish their bath.

152.content: Alright, let's get the choices for our favorite Psychic gym leader out of the way...
152.title: Sabrina!

choices: She walks into a gym or outdoors
Then someone enters
Something else.
1521.content:
In Saffron City Gym, it had been less busy season with the trainers. Sabrina was residing by her desk, having taken care of the more mundane paperwork required regularily from a Gym Leader. Yes, not something really shown, often because it is simply boring to watch.

While she has always taken pleasure of her position, challenging the trainers to duel against psychic types and learn what works best against the type. That was one of the important points about different gyms specializing in different types. No matter how much a trainer would be intending to specialize in certain types, they would have to at least learn the basics and that includes becoming familiar with the pokemon types out there. This would softly force them to train at least one or two pokemons strong against certain types so they will not be caught too offguard when things would get serious. And thus, become better trainers in general.

However, what was burdening Sabrina at the time was less involved with pokemon and more about the other big thing in her life. Being a psychic. She was a real deal, able to match and exceed most psychic type pokemon with what she can do, from similar things to the techniques they use to... something different. She has been known to be able to shrink down people, perhaps through molecular rearrangement or some other means. Would perhaps be too complex to explain without it looking like pulling something out of one's arse.

Still, there is people who doubt psychics are real, whether because the ones getting in news or heard about in contests turn out to be fakes, only aided by their pokemon... or they are just people taking advantage out of gullible people. It can be argued that such uncertainty can be an advantage to keep people away from bothering psychics, though she did get frustrated whenever people specialized in busting hoaxes and supernatural phenomenon would appear. Seriously, nitpickers raise their ugly smug heads even when you have ghost pokemon messing up conceptions about afterlife or you get the occasional possible alien pokemon if what is told of such creatures as Deoxys is of any indication. Those people could be annoying with their nosy attitudes and not believing even the most obvious signs of her about to prove her powers on their sorry asses. And sometimes she did. Such satisfying moments, seeing them squirm or trying to futilely argue that her towering over them was just a hallucination.

Granted, she'd not do any permanent damage on them, just a trauma at most, hopefully making them stop being such annoying little fu-

... Then she came to what she had been also frustrated about. She knew her psychic powers were immense. But how immense? Has she ever really pushed her abilities to their extend or what her limits were... no, she didn't have any ideas of world domination or anything. She was... just feeling impotent. Feeling like she's confined within a box too small, not really being able to stretch out, not without breaking things like it was nothing.



... More the reason that she had to really finally do something about it. Making sure no one was looking, she stretched and let out a long groan or yell to relieve herself a bit. Get some clarity.

Then, looking upon a spoon on the table. Bending it was really one of the first things she did, that was child's play. Literally... but what if she tried something else to it.

She looked down on it... then with little effort, she shrank it down. That was not a problem. Then she made it resume in size... and then made it grow bigger... and bigger... then it was the size of an oar when she snapped out of it. With a doll on a shelf sitting down, almost as if in looking down at what she was doing, Sabrina examined the spoon. It was feeling the same. With its structure having been adjusted within so that it did not collapse under its weight. Not even if it was made much much bigger.

Perhaps... she could do the same on a living being... or maybe even herself...
1521.title: Sabrina's subtle frustration

choices: She walked into the wide open gym, don't want unwanted attraction
Somewhere else.
15211.content:
She pondered about that wild possibility. Maybe she should try it out on someone else or one of her pokemons. Can't be too sure about it. But if she did end up... growing into a giantess... she then was starting to imagine how that'd feel while keeping her subconscious starting to transform herself bigger. After all, she has been held off by herself so long. Either way, she was not going to hold back any more. She was going to let herself loose. Hard. That thought set such a wide satisfied grin on herself. She can't remember when she was this excited.

And probably can grow her clothes alongside too when it came down to it. Or at least a new set separately in case she did burst out of her clothes when it'd happen.

152112.title: Heading out of Gym for Sabrina

choices: Perhaps head out somewhere, back to Saffron City or elsewhere
She spots someone nearby.
1521121.content:
After minutes of walking, Sabrina had gone to the center of the vast field, feeling the wind un-filtered by any trees or such breezing over. It was a good, nice summer day. Barely a cloud in the sky. However, if her plan does work, there will be a shadow upon the area soon.

Clearing her mind, letting herself feel her own body throughout, deeper than what an untrained mind, especially a non-psychic would, understand. Perhaps what she was about to do was about rearranging her base components or adding up to them through whatever means, who knows? She either does not care to let on any secrets or just never bothered about it unless if she met one she'd figure would understand or at least truly appreciate it.

Before this, she had taken measure from a nearby tree, at a convenient 50 feet roughly. She had measured it through a technique a landscape designer mentioned once; taking a 3-foot long stick, holding it up vertically and counting the steps she'd take, each about 3 feet long until the stick would match with the tree. It was just a neat moment of applying a random nice piece of trivia at least once. And adding a little something to what she was about to do.




After a moment, a familiar sensation would run through her... surging the energy she would use on others, downsizing them or even transforming them into puppets. This time it would however be aimed at herself, giving an extra tickling feeling and massaging feeling... and she knew she had to keep eyes open too. Good thing as well, as she suddenly felt herself lifted up higher... only to realize that yes, it was actually her having gone taller. She touched the tree... and she was reaching halfway its height. The tree also felt much leaner.

She could not stop here. If she was going to do this, she was going to do it well. Then she focused again... and seeing herself rise up along the tree... until she faced its top... then higher... and higher... she was now leaving the tree facing her waist... and she would keep growing. Funny, it actually turned out to be simpler than she thought. Most of all, that earlier impotence and frustration felt more vented the more she stretched out like this. It was a relief... beyond words. An air of freedom would surround her as she stretched out with what would be about 150 foot tall form. She paid little mind to whoever may have been around as she swung her hair and then poked that tree with her foot... then stroked it. It was like a flower to her by now, but then stopped as she found some bird pokemon flutter out of it, and stood back to her height.

This is amazing... she could have done this all along... and she didn't feel anywhere close to being strained. Sure, it took a little re-orientation as she walked around, almost falling a bit with the new height but stabilizing herself. Especially when each step she took may have been causing a little rumble, or at least made her wonder about the amount of weight she put on per foot.

Then it was time to look around again while considering growing more at times...
1521121.title: She goes to a nearby field

It was one of those 'hoaxbusters' or whatever they called themselves. She would not bother to give them the dignity of knowing the proper title or even his name. She just found it unbelievable that there's people who don't say anything about Pokemon lifting things with their minds but somehow humans doing the same thing and others?

Then again, some are just idiots.

After a blurr of whatever bullcrap she was halfhearing; "... So that's why we find it hard to believe you actually have done these things. I mean, wouldn't it have hit more on the news how you 'shrank' some people with your powers or even turned them into dolls. So what we are here for is make you tell that its just a whole load of a hoax and you should admit you're a liar!"

Sabrina cocked her eyebrow at this guy. "Hm? Weren't you supposed to make me prove that so you could then try to deny it?"

"No, I do not bother doing that, we are journalists! We were paid to write how it is rather than do research! We have been busy removing integrity as of late. That's why we plain ignore anything about what we are supposed to critique and just make people believe what we're paid to make them believe!"

This pretty much was the last straw. She could feel a vein pop in her head. What load of bullcrap is being passed as professional these days, or what has been sacrificed for the sake of personal profit? There is no way she would let this pass. And sometimes, one could and should screw subtleness.

She rose up and suddenly there was some odd feeling in the air... the crew behind the interviewer looked worried but the interviewer just looked barely phased.

"Huh? What are you trying to do? Look, if you pay us more, we can write whatever you want us to write, it goes both ways-"

1522.content:
Sabrina is perhaps the most powerful psychic in the world. Even at a young age her powers were extraordinary. By the time Sabrina reached puberty, she could shrink people down or turn them into dolls--something that other psychics couldn't do. Perhaps that was the cause of Sabrina's identity crisis a few years back. Back then she was more of a wrathful goddess than a mere human with psychic powers; she turned people who lost to her in gym battles into dolls and put them in her toybox, she insisted on getting a dais and a throne for herself and she had changed her own mother into a doll. After the crisis was over, Sabrina changed all the dolls back into people and apologized for her behavior.
Sabrina still kept the dais and her throne because she wanted them. It made her feel like a queen; the queen of her own castle--of her own gym.
As she grew older her powers only increased. Now she could hear the thoughts of people if they were close enough. The radius of it seemed to be only a few feet surrounding her. Sabrina could control that power at will and it was lucky that she could do so or else she might've gone insane by listening to all those thoughts.
Sabrina had redone her gym--or at least the inside of it. Now it was filled with rooms that could only be reached by teleport pads. The junior pokemon trainers that worked at the gym would each get a room and would challenge any to a pokemon fight. It wasn't uncommon for gym leaders to redo their gyms on the inside.


Sabrina wandered down the aisle of a mart. She needed potions and other supplies. As a gym leader she would've asked one of the junior trainers at her gym to fetch things for her but all of the junior trainers were on vacation now, thus forcing Sabrina to go to the mart herself. Even though it was the "off" season, Sabrina still had to fight trainers that came to her gym. Only junior trainers got time off and Sabrina didn't mind that at all.
While Sabrina was wandering down the aisle something caught her attention; it was a fruit basket with a quite large orange. The basket had a label on it that read:

"These fruits were specially grown in the Xanadu Nursery using a new method, causing these fruits to become larger than before! Now on sale!"

"Hmmm...." said Sabrina as she took the large orange. It was about three times the size of a normal orange.


After she was done shopping, Sabrina walked out of the mart and decided to eat the orange she just got. She was simply starving and the orange did look good. She got out a knife and cut a large slice from the orange and took a bite out of it. The orange was quite tasty.

A rock was kicked in the air. As it made someone groan in pain, a ticked off figure of rather gracefully dressed, pink-haired girl was walking on a path, some murmuring and chatter heard from above. Not that she paid it and the truck any mind, she had other things in mind.

"Grrr, daring to say I just threw in an excuse... wasn't my fault that the floor remained slippery after the previous round, the cleaning crew was supposed to take care of that. But nooooo, that judge had to go and say 'another factor you can't control but can adapt to' and such sh... well, that Dawn's gonna yet learn that I can and will hand her sweet butt on a platter..." her rage was quickly calmed down by her Plusle and Minun crawling around her shoulders, and she gave the two of them a pat. "Don't worry guys, you did what you could. You just had things working against you as well as me, but you'll do better next time. Now then..." and she zaps them back to the pokeballs.

And just as she was saying that, she was suddenly knocked on a head by a container, it opening up and covering her and her clothes with goo. As she was barely blinking and gawking, with the sudden situation having literally hit her, there was someone yelling "Are you alright miss!?" Followed by "You idiot! That one contained the liquid form of rare candy that was being experimented on and THAT happened to be right in the front and with only the lower bottle restrained!?" yelled by who could be assumed to be the foreman or whatever in the truck. His assistant complained that the way the containers were formed, it looked like just one big container. Not that it made too much difference, as one should have put the restrained on the middle rather than one third of the way.

Nor any of that mattered to Ursula "YOU IDIOTS! What the hell you think you're doing there!? That could have broken my neck for all I know and all this goo-" to her surprise, the goo was... gone? Only slight moisture reminding of it ever being there. She was wondering about that as she was angrily climbing up and up... and then was surprised at... looking down on the escort. "What the fu-?" as she looked down... the crew and the vehicle... appeared... so tiny... her mind was having hard time processing this as it hit her. It also gave the crew ample time to look at her...

The crew were looking at her mostly still clothed form. "How the hell could it make her clothes grow as well, I thought its only on living matter... " -"Or then its molecular-level, I don't know!" argued the two truck crewmen. Either one was a scientist or at least genre-savvy and has read about such crap. Either way, they both realized that Ursula had not moved much, as she was deep in thought or shocked... making her suddenly moving again more of a shock and quite intimidating, seeing something that gigantic, maybe 100 feet tall or more, move at all. Then she reached down...

"Oh... Oh man... is this... for real...?" Ursula asked, as she was slowly reaching down to touch anything at all. The crewmen were moving too fast. Not that she couldn't just swap them in her hand quickly as she would soon learn, but she settled in picking the truck.

That truck looked like it easily weighed more than a filled bus, perhaps with some hightech stuff inside it... but she was picking it like a child would pick a toy and she took it in her hands, weighing it and silently looking down on it. And then inside it as well as any details she could. One of the truck crew was about to yell at her, but then seeing how she was holding that mighty vehicle of SCIENCE be picked up so easily by this young girl... a girl they soon would have wished they had not met, not that it was with fatal consequences. Especially when a grin formed up on her face.

"... No way... I am really gigantic... Aah! Need more proof!" She said as she roughly placed the truck down and reached at one of the crewmen. It was amazing. She had snatched a human being and lifted him up like he was nothing. And far smaller than any pokemon in her team. She did not pay mind to the screams and him begging her not to hurt him, at least not until she deemed it amusing to do so. She picked one of his hands between thumb and finger and caaaarefully moved his arm up and down. She was being careful, bloody stuff is not her thing. And she'd prefer him to bow down with both hands. Why? She was simply just... so much bigger. The thoughts started to form up, perhaps scrambled initially but they did eventually form a clear picture of a simple situation. She was a giant. Looming over these tiny people...

While it may end up presenting itself with awkward situations perhaps, unless if there was going to be some convenient explanation for why she doesn't have to... worry about the most awkward of them. Or maybe she could shrink back too but first... "So, what was in that container and how did it do this to me?" she asked the blonde guy in her hand. Her fingers were unbudged by his struggles, giving her more satisfied grin, that mere feeling of overpowering such helpless little thing.

"A liquidated form of rare ca-" he was cut off by who she assumed to be his superior (or at least someone with more sense)... and she cut him off by putting hand down on him, hearing muffling beneath it. Unfortunately, the boss had done his deed and the assistant was reluctant to let her know more. So instead, she let him go... and then snatch the first thing he was going after. Looking at it, it looked like a container similar to what cracked on top of her head. She was having devious ideas. "Any idea how long this will la... oh right, you would tell me very short time, huh? Well, doesn't matter! Don't worry. I'll be nice..." she said... this time letting out a long laugh, putting a hand in front of her mouth and then both hands on hips "I AM F**KING GIGANTIC! Now everyone knows who's standing above them now!" And kept laughing... and poked the guy as he was accusing her of repeating herself some. And crunched the hood on the truck with a flick of her finger.

Now... what to do, she was thinking as she put the container in and looked in for more in the truck as well as picking the name of the lab on its side. Maybe there'll be more wherever it was heading to or was going to if she was going to grow more... But for now...

15531.content:
Silph Co. is responsible for much of the technology behind Pokemon. It was Silph Co that created the Pokeball and other kinds of Pokeballs including the Master Ball that could catch any pokemon without fail; you don't even have to battle a pokemon in order to catch it with a Master Ball. The cost to make a Master Ball is far too expensive to mass produce them; only very few people have a Master Ball. A couple of years ago, Team Rocket took over Silph Co in order to get a Master Ball. Back then the security of Silph Co was a cruel joke; the company spent little on security and the little security they did have didn't even have Pokemon to battle with and thus the takeover took place. It was a cakewalk for Team Rocket. Luckily a Pokemon trainer by the name of Red saved the company by pushing out the forces of Team Rocket...for his help, Red got the one of the first Master Ball that was ever produced. Red then went on to capture a Zapdos that had made its home in a power plant. (a/n note: Obliviously, not the same Zapdos that lives in the Orange Islands and I did tend to use the Master Ball to capture Zapdos. I thought Zapdos was more cooler than Mewtwo)

However this story isn't about Red and his adventures. After Red saved Silph Co, the company took security a little more seriously. To that end, the company hired a bunch of security guards with Pokemon in order to stop any future trouble. However that doesn't mean that trouble won't happen again.

Silph Co had its headquarters in Saffron City, the largest city in the Kanto region, A city so big that it has two pokemon gyms but only one of them is an Indigo League gym while the other gym is an actual gym. This story isn't about Sabrina or....whoever runs the other gym. Hey, give me a break here people. It's been years since I've played Pokemon Blue.

Ahem

This is a story about Officer Jenny of Saffron City.

------

Officer Jenny sighed as she went over paperwork at the police station. It was boring work but it needed to be done. She would prefer to be on patrol tonight but she had put off doing the paperwork for far too long now and she needed to do it. Anyway there would be nothing happening this late at night. The crime rate of Saffron had fallen off dramatically ever since that trainer drove out Team Rocket. Jenny wondered where was that young man now..what was his name? Red? A funny name to have Jenny had always thought. Why name someone after a color? Last names she could understand but first names? Jenny shook her head and continued to the paperwork before her.
Jenny wasn't the only officer at the police station of course. The station was filled with officers of both sexes. The room was filled was chatter and the ringing of phones.
"Jenny!" yelled a young male officer. "would you go over to Silph Co? They say there's a masked man prowling around"
"Yes please" said Jenny. "I'm tired of this dull paperwork. Anything else?"
"One of the security guards said that the masked man wasn't alone"
"Right" said Jenny. "I'm on it!"

Jenny arrived at Silph Co some ten minutes later on her motorcycle. She saw no evidence of a prowler anywhere near the building. She parked the motorcycle across the street and walked in the front door. A security guard met her at the reception desk.
"You say you have a prowler?" asked Jenny.
"Yeah" said the guard. "I noticed him outside just twenty minutes ago along with at least a dozen or so people following him. I hope it's not another take over"
"I doubt it" said Jenny. "the leader was wearing a mask?"
"Yeah" said the guard. "I didn't get a very good look at him though"
"What--" started Jenny.
"Weezing, smog!" yelled a male voice. Jenny turned in time to see the front door burst open and a man wearing a mask came in with a Weezing right in front of him. The Weezing opened its mouth and out spewed a thick dark cloud that quickly filled the room. Jenny threw her pokeball, releasing her Growlithe while the guard released a Staraptor--a rather interesting choice since Staraptor weren't known to live in Kanto. What happened next completely surprised Jenny.
"Staraptor, use Take Down on Growlithe!" ordered the guard.
Growlithe was taken completely by surprise as the Staraptor attacked. Growlithe was hit squarely which made it stagger but it didn't fall down.
"You're no guard!" said Jenny.
"What was the first clue, honey?" sneered the guard.
"Growlithe, Flame Thrower!" ordered Jenny. While giving the order she heard a dozen footsteps behind her. It sounded like a dozen people were entering the building. 'This is a distraction' Jenny realized. Jenny couldn't see much because of the smog left by Weezing so she couldn't tell where the people were going.
Growlithe fired a Flame Thrower at Staraptor who dodged it.
"Growlithe, you take care of this" said Jenny. "I'm going to---"
"No you don't!" yelled the fake guard who pulled some kind of gun out of a pocket and pointed it right at Jenny. It didn't look like a normal gun.
"Nighty-night" said the fake guard who fired the gun. The gun shot out some kind of bullet that hit Jenny squarely in the chest. The bullet wasn't going anywhere near fast enough to do damage but upon hitting Jenny, the bullet released some kind of gas that made Jenny black out. The last thing that Jenny knew before darkness took her was the sight of her Growlithe attacking the fake guard.

"Hey, are you alright?" asked a voice.
Jenny opened her eyes to see someone in a lab coat standing above her. Her eyes focused on the nametag on the white lab coat: Professor Timothy Tidwell, head of the Black Department*
"I think so" said Jenny seeing her Growlithe beside her. "what happened?"
"I don't know" said Tim. "the last thing I knew the whole room went black. When I came to I went down in the elevator and found you here. I think we had a break-in"
"Yeah" said Jenny. "was anything stolen?"
"We're still figuring that out" said Tim. There was something about that statement that made Jenny think that Tim was hiding something.


*The Black Department of Silph Co runs top-secret projects. Not even the other departments of Silph Co know what kind of projects the Black Department does.

(a/n note: This is a story where Jenny doesn't grow right away nor is it clear what will make her eventually grow. I wanted to start off on a mysterious robbery and leave it to you, the reader, to continue this story at this point in the story. I also wanted a story in which the main character doesn't grow right away. So I ask you not to make Jenny grow in the next chapter. Of course you can do anything you want because I can't stop you. I just don't want Jenny to grow because of that gun...why would robbers want to make a police officer grow?)

15533.content: How about Cynthia, the Sinnoh Champion?
15533.title: Sinnoh Champion?

choices: Cynthia decides to go to her hometown

155331.content:
I am.......
I am......
I am.......Cynthia
I am all and I am one. I am everything I see, I am everything I don't see. I am everywhere. I exist everywhere and nowhere. I am all that there is...all that ever could be.....all that shall be. I am.....

Where am I?

This place doesn't make any sense

I can feel so many thing entering my head....do I even have a head anymore?

I see all....everything. I see everything that is happening.....everywhere. I can see the universe and all that lies within it...I can see outside the universe and see the great darkness beyond....I can see the countless dimensions that exist all around us....I see Ash and his friends....I see a galactic war taking place on the other side of the universe....I can hear all of the thoughts and hopes of countless trillions of beings....I can look into all possible futures.....I know what's going to happen.......

I know everything

But a human can't handle all that....no....no human mind can comprehend all that information....no human mind can comprehend all those voices....

So how can I, a human, can possibly live through this? Any other human would be....dazzled. Unable to cope. A human mind wasn't built to comprehend all those things........but if that is true, how can I still be.....sensible?


Oh dear. You are in trouble, aren't you? Poor little human....poor little Cynthia....

...Who's that? I thought I was alone

You are never alone. Not now. There's no turning back

Who are you?

I am the Original One. I am Arceus

...Arceus?! What happened to me? Where am I?

Do you not remember, child? You were exploring some newly-discovered ruins at Mt. Coronet when you slipped through a portal....a portal that you knew you had to get away from even though you didn't knew why. The portal wasn't stable....it seemed to chase you down and swallow you up and it sent you here....sent you to my realm

Your realm? Is this....?

This isn't the afterlife, child. This is my personal realm. You could say that this is the realm of the gods where no mortal is allowed to go....and yet....you are here. This isn't the first time this has happened but such a thing hasn't happened for over a thousand generations.

How....how do I get back?

That's a complicated matter. You see, my realm is teeming with power....my power...my power is everywhere here. Any mortal that finds themselves here in my realm are...transformed by that power.

..Why?

Because that's the only way a mortal can survive here. If that power hadn't seeped into you, you'd have gone hopelessly insane. You wouldn't be able to function. Your puny mortal mind would've cracked by a dropped dinner plate

Thanks for the imagery

I merely speak the facts.

Wait....you said that mortals are transformed....into what?

Gods

You're saying that I am a goddess now?!

Indeed

....you must be joking. I am not worthy to be a god

Worth has nothing to do with it.

How's come that portal was unstable? HOW can a portal can be unstable?

That portal was made by the last mortal that found his way here through other means. He was inexperienced then. He created that portal without stablizing it. Since then, that portal has opened up randomly and chased after people.

Yeah...I remember now. I was completely terrified by it. I knew I had to get away from it....because deep down inside me I knew the portal would bring me here to this place...

Indeed. Your instincts told you to run and you did ran.

But I wasn't looking close enough to where I was going ...I was that terrified of the portal. I grew careless. I tripped over a rock and fell....it was a mistake..a total fluke

You can go back if you truly want to. But you'll be different. You'll be a goddess. You wield a power that hasn't been in the hands of mortals for more than a thousand generations

I...don't know what to do with that kind of power

Power corrupts...and absolute power corrupts absolutely. It's a risky thing giving someone power. You don't know what a person will do with that power

....Do you have any advice?

No. You're a goddess now. You can make your own mind over what to do from this point forward. You can set rules for yourself or not....this is your journey, champion of Sinnoh...the start of a new adventure....


Cynthia appeared in one of the tunnels that ran through Mt. Coronet. She appeared in a brilliant flash of light that filled the tunnel with blinding light. When the light dimmed Cynthia was there. She didn't look any different now but power radiated from her like heat from a blast furnace. She looked up and down the tunnel until she decided to walk in a direction. In her mind, she could hear all of the people in the world; she could her them talking, laughing, crying, praying, making love and much more.
'What to do now?' wondered Cynthia. 'I can't very well act like nothing has happened. Do I....start a new religion? Do I make a church for myself? Okay....first things first...better start off with some ground rules like not messing with free will....yeah....yeah, I like that. Don't mess with free will....and....uh....'
Cynthia stepped out of the tunnel and into daylight. As she was making her way down the mountain, she started to grow. With each step she took she gained another ten feet. Her clothes tightened and then ripped apart as she grew and grew. She couldn't have stopped growing if she had wanted to; it was her new-found power that was making her grow. 'Well, the gods were giants in those old stories after all' thought Cynthia. 'so who am I to argue with that?'
Cynthia eventually stopped growing until she was a little over 200 feet tall.
155331.title: Cynthia's Ascension

choices: Lucas immediately swears fealty to the new goddess and accompanies her to town.

1553312.content:
Now standing at her new giant height, Cynthia began to walk, taking great thundering strides that shook the earth with each step. Normally, being naked this far up Mount Coronet would be freezing, but hardly anything about Cynthia was "normal" anymore-- after all, she was a goddess now. She felt quite comfortable, actually, warmed by the heavenly power that emanated from within her, yet still able to enjoy the pleasant breeze across her nude body. Within a few moments, she could already feel her nipples hardening in the wind, and blushed. Looking down at her breasts, she could see that they had apparently grown bigger, even in relation to how huge the rest of her was. She had always taken pride in having a rather large rack, but now their size was positively unreal; with each booming step down the mountainside, they bounced and jiggled wildly. Instinctively reaching behind her, Cynthia could feet that her butt and hips had grown accordingly as well, giving her a full and quite enviable hourglass figure, worthy of a goddess like herself.

'Heh, looks like being a deity gave me more than just infinite power,' she thought happily to herself, and knowledge instantly spawned in her mind that she could change, grow, and otherwise alter her form as much as she wanted now. For the moment, though, she was content to keep her "giantess supermodel" look. Within just a couple of minutes, Cynthia made her way back down the mountain, her immense form towering over the verdant Sinnoh landscape. Thinking over her next decision, she decided to head toward Celestic Town-- her home-- first, figuring the highly spiritual residents (including her own grandmother) would have good advice on how best to establish her godly reign... as she trained her mind on the small mountain town, she suddenly began to hear all of their thoughts at once, wincing for a moment before trying to shut them out, "Oof...that could get annoying," she noted, hoping that she'd be able to keep her new omniscience under control after some more practice.

As she stomped through the forests toward Celestic Town, though, her godly mind homed in on a single source-- a familiar one. She instantly realized that the person in question was her young friend Lucas, the plucky young Trainer from Sandgem Town who worked for Professor Rowan and helped battle Team Galactic at the height of their threat. He was currently hiking along in the woods and training his Torterra, only to be taken by complete surprise when he saw the heavenly giantess that was now Cynthia stomp into view from the treeline. His mortal mind was overtaken by her godly aura, and he instinctively bowed down to Cynthia, while sneaking a glance upward to admire her sexy body... it was at this moment when he recognized her, partially snapping out of his stupor.

"Wait...C-Cynthia, is that you?" he asked, trembling slightly as he stared up at the radiant, naked body of his friend. Cynthia giggled and smiled warmly, able to sense his nervousness and finding it rather cute. She reached down and gently picked him up in one hand, and he could instantly feel her warm aura seep into him, putting his mind at ease.

"Yep! As you can see, I've had a bit of a, er....makeover since we last met!" Cynthia said, giggling some more while trying to keep her powerful voice from sounding too loud.
1553312.title: First of many

15533121.content:
When Cynthia's warm aura seeped into Lucas it did more than put his mind at ease. The warm aura made no demand whatsoever at being revered and worshiped but Lucas felt that he should worship Cynthia. It was as if the warm aura was an extension of Cynthia's godly power and that power was overwhelming to behold...like it needed to be revered but it also made no such demand.
Lucas just stared up at Cynthia and didn't see her as she appeared to be; Cynthia was bathed in a bright light that shined on her alone and she seemed tall without measure....as if she were thousands and thousands of feet tall. Perhaps it was the warm aura itself that had altered Lucas's perception of Cynthia. It didn't matter much to Lucas what caused his perception to alter when he was looking at Cynthia. "What lab are we breaking into again?" asked James.
"The one that's labeled 'Restricted Access'" said Jessie.
"Why?" asked Meowth. "what's in dere?"
"That's what we're gonna find out" said Jessie.

James, Jessie and Meowth had spent the day casing a research center located in Vermilion City. The research center was a brand new building hardly a year old. Access to the building was restricted to all but a few scientists that were working on highly secret projects. What those projects might be was unknown. Naturally, Giovanni wanted to know what was in the center. Unluckily, the only ones available to go on the mission were James, Jessie and Meowth. Giovanni had regretted it but he sent the three Rocket members anyway. Giovanni's orders were simple; get any notes on any of the many projects that were in the center. If the center was working on something that interested him, he would send somebody else to take over the project.
Getting into the center was surprisingly easy all because of a lazy security guard. Now James, Jessie and Meowth were walking down a well-lit corridor.
During the day, the Rocket trio spent their time in studying a stolen floor plan--provided by Giovanni--and made their decision. Near the back of the center was a lab that was only labeled "Restricted Access - Lab 11" There were other labs of course but Lab 11 caught Jessie's eye. The floor plan explained what the other labs were working on but not Lab 11. Jessie figured whatever was in Lab 11 was what the boss wanted. Their decision made, the trio waited until night to enter the center and steal whatever was in Lab 11.
"Where did the boss get the floor plan of this research center?" asked James now.
"He didn't say" said Jessie. "and why should it matter?"
"There it is!" yelled Meowth. "Lab 11 is straight ahead!"
"Quiet!" snapped Jessie.
The doorway to Lab 11 was a simple door but it needed a keycard. Luckily Meowth had stolen one from the lazy guard with his quick paws. Meowth handed the keycard to Jessie. Jessie slid the card through the reader and the door opened. The trio entered the darkened Lab 11.

The lab was a typical lab with three long tables right down the middle. All of the tables had vials and beakers filled with liquids of all the colors it seemed. Notes were scattered here and there on the tables. A number of super computers lined the walls of the lab. The only light came from moonlight spilling in through the windows which gave the lab an eerie sight.

"Hehehe" giggled Meowth. "we managed to get in here without being caught. Dis is a jackpot!"
"Well now" said a familiar voice. "I wouldn't say that"
The trio turned around and saw Ash, Brock and Misty were there!
"Why are the twerps here?" asked James.
"Did you actually think we wouldn't notice you three sneaking around?" asked Ash. "we were on our way to take a vacation cruise on the S.S. Anne when we happened to see you three sneaking into this place"
"We called the cops" said Brock.
"They should be here any minute" said Misty.

"What do we do now, Jessie?" asked James.
"What else?" asked Jessie, throwing a pokeball. Seviper came out. "Poison fang!"
"Go, carnivane!" shouted James throwing a pokeball. "use....attack the twerps not me!"
"Go, Pikachu!" said Ash. Pikachu jumped from Ash's shoulder. "use iron tail!"

Predictably, Team Rocket lost the fight. Unpredictably, however, during the last few moments of the fight Ash just happened to be standing near several of the vials filled with a purplish liquid. An errant vine whip from Carnivine had hit several of the vials, causing one to shatter. The purple liquid went everywhere including on Ash who got drenched with the stuff. When the fight was over, the trio were blasting away again thanks to Pikachu.

"Are you alright, Ash?" asked Misty.
"Yeah...just got covered with...whatever this stuff is" said Ash. "I hope it washes off"

The warehouse was once a disused building that was originally built for storage for the large Silph Company to store their "lab failures" as they called them. Silph Co. were the ones that made the Pokeballs and the Masterball but the company did create other stuff as well. Top secret stuff.

Other warehouses were said to hold a lot more slaves. The warehouse was divided into two sections; one for the slaves and the other for the Jessie Squad. The Jessie Squad were mostly made from former members of the now disbanded Team Rocket. The Jessie Squad were mostly females but a few males had been allowed to join the Squad during recent months. The Jessie Squad were the slave drivers; they were the ones in charge when the "goddess" herself wasn't around. In the far corner of the warehouse in a bunk bed next to a loose floor board that only a handful of slaves knew about, Ash Ketchum woke up.

"I'll try my best, Ma'am" said Ash, failing to keep the anger out of his voice.
"Don't get smart at me, slave" sneered Cassidy. "or you'll regret it. Now out of my face and report for work at the temple"
Ash didn't say anything as he walked away from Cassidy.

Ash walked out of the warehouse and into a gloomy morning; it was overcast and it was spitting rain. He made his way slowly to the temple which once was the pokemon gym of Viridian City. Now the gym served as the temple of Jessie the Great--the new goddess of the age. Goddess of the age indeed! Jessie had no supernatural powers at all; she just called herself a goddess only because she was 800 feet tall..which was a very good reason to yourself a god Ash supposed. Nobody could challenge her rule....unless, of course, someone else were to grow like Jessie had. But nobody knew what had caused Jessie to grow. Jessie had forbidden anyone to ask that; if anyone disobeyed, they would get eaten.
Ash made it to the temple and saw that about a thousand slaves were putting the finishing touches on the temple. Cassidy was probably right about the temple being finished today....and then Ash and the other slaves would get another assignment like trimming the toenails of Jessie or something else degrading.
"Ash" cried a voice. Ash looked and saw Misty,
"Hey Misty" said Ash. "have you seen Gary at all? He didn't come in last night"
"I'm afraid I haven't" said Misty.
"Hey, you two!" yelled a slave driver. "quit shirking and get working!"

info.brief_description: A throwback to the fun, silly Pokémon growth stories of the mid-late 2000s, with no limits
info.description:
Anyone remember the kind of Pokémon GTS stories that used to be common a few years ago? Where they almost universally revolved around the anime, plot was a minimal concern, and they usually involved the main girls getting huge through some silly filler episode-esque shenanigans and proceeding to go on a fun and sexy rampage across the region? I sure do! And I think it'd be fun to go back to those roots, with fun and accessible expansion antics that need not overly concern themselves with gimmicks, superdense plotting, or anything else like that.

Now granted, there are still some rules, albeit loose ones. All stories take place in the Pokémon animeverse, though contributors are free to bring in elements from any other canons (the games, Pokémon Special, other mangas, etc), and the main focus is growing to giant size, but other types of expansion (fat, muscle, BE, even some transformation) can be added later on if it serves your plot. Unlike the stories I'm homaging, gender of the characters who grow is not a concern, though girls ought to remain the focus. And, as usual with my interactives, there is to be no gore, pee, or scat. Sexual content is encouraged regardless of age or gender, as is cloths-ripping!

Otherwise, though, go nuts! As much debauchery as possible is encouraged, the plots don't need to be "serious" at all, and otherwise, just have fun like it's 2005 all over again.
